The Project

In a world where the entertainment industry has completely shut down due to a virus, five musical theatre geeks join forces to create a way to combat Quarantine Boredom and find a way to keep their love for entertainment and TTRPGs thriving!

Tabletop Tiddies is a queer and feminist TTRPG podcast based out of beautiful British Columbia, Canada and run entirely by people of marginalized genders.  Each episode will enthrall you into a fantastical world created by our Dungeon Goddess: Charlene Bayer. 

Our mission is to embrace and empower women in the nerd community! Listen each week as the players: Amanda, Emily, Rachel and Sara, take on Charlene's puzzles and unique world. Prepare for a lot of chaos, singing, nerdy references and... possibly some drunken madness!

We can't wait to meet you all!

Charlene (SHE/HER) is Tabletop Tiddies’ Season 1 DM, and she couldn’t be more thrilled! An avid TTRPG player, this will be her first time DMing, and she is praying to have strong Brennan Lee Mulligan vibes. Her storytelling and character/world building skills come from her two professional theatre degrees (John Abbott College and Capilano University Musical Theatre) as well as her long history of video game obsession. An avid feminist and horror lover, Char is the creator and host of Drinking And Screaming, a top-rated queer and feminist podcast about horror movies and cocktails! She also plays Morgan on Vancouver By Night (a Vampire The Masquerade Actual Play Stream) and Nat on Space Game (an Out On The Rim Actual Play Stream). When she isn’t playing TTRPGs, video games, or podcasting, Char is a voice actor for various video games and film/tv productions. When it comes to TTRPGs Char has played with some of the greats, including Matthew Mercer, Mark Meer, B.Dave Walters, Cynthia Marie, and so many more… She won’t stop until this can become her full-time job too! Char currently lives in Vancouver with her partner Kelly and her cat Buddy.

Emily (SHE/HER) could not be more excited to be one of the players for “Tabletop Tiddies”! She is a Level 1 TTRPGer, excited to return to the world of DND after not playing since university and spent the vast majority of her socially distant time listening to actual play podcasts. Before discovering podcasting and RPGs, Emily graduated from the Bachelor of Performing Arts program at Douglas College and the Musical Theatre Diploma program at Capilano University. Currently, she teaches dance and musical theatre at the Lindbjerg Academy of Performing Arts in Coquitlam and Richmond, BC and is a newly certified ACE Personal Trainer. Emily is a player and editor for the actual play podcast Legends: A Superhero Story, which uses a new TTRPG system, “Legends,” written by Chad and Jack Matchette, Emily’s father and brother.

A fan of make-believe and dress up from a young age, Sara (SHE/HER) is delighted to be a player on season 1 of “Tabletop Tiddies.” Before the world shut down, her only RPG game consisted of a deeply flawed one-off in highschool. Now she is proud to say that she has dipped her toes in the water, slipped, and fallen headfirst into multiple campaigns. Outside of the dice life, she is a classically trained singer and spends her free time working on her music on her youtube channel and for events. She, like her fellow players, is a graduate of Capilano University’s Musical theatre program and can be found around BC performing to highschools, historic theatres, and under the open-air… once it all opens up again. 

Amanda (SHE/HER) is super thrilled to be one of the players of ""Tabletop Tiddies.""  A big nerd herself, Amanda has always found the world of D&
column2:
D and TTRPG very intriguing and thinks it's about time she rolled up her sleeves (and dice) and joined a new campaign. She's a graduate of the Musical Theatre program at Capilano University and currently works as a teacher for Shine Bright Musical Theatre. Aside from the arts, Amanda is also very passionate about Social Justice and has decided to return to school to study Law. In her free time, Amanda enjoys listening to podcasts, fangirling over Avatar (TLAB and Korra) and embroidering for her friends. She is also a player for the play podcast Legends: A Superhero Story, which uses a new TTRPG system, “Legends,” written by Chad and Jack Matchette.

Rachel (SHE/HER) couldn’t be more hyped to be a part of Tabletop Tiddies! As a graduate of the Musical Theatre Program at Capilano University, and a die hard fan of videogames, she has always been a fan of storytelling and Roleplaying Games. Her previous experience with the tabletop variety were only a few campaigns with close friends, but that was more than enough to hook her in and want even more! If you have been to live theatre in Vancouver you may have seen her on stage! Some of her previous Theatre credits include: Texas/Ensemble in Cabaret (Royal City Musical Theatre), Ensemble in Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat Align Entertainment), Ensemble in both The Drowsy Chaperone and Beauty and the Beast (Theatre Under the Stars), and Mrs. Meers in Thoroughly Modern Millie (Exit 22). She hopes everyone is staying safe out there and hopes that this podcast can be a light to those who need it in what has been a very intense year!

 

What We Need 

Creating a podcast from scratch isn't easy or cheap! We are looking to raise $5,000 CAD to be able to get the dice rolling. The funds raised in this campaign will be allocated into the following:

column1: • Indiegogo's Cut (5% of all earnings.)
• Equipment upgrades.
• Marketing : Merch creation, website, character art and ad spaces.
• Production : Podcast hosting service, editing software.
• Unforeseen costs associated with the podcast.
• GUESTS! As the podcast grows, we are hoping to bring in guests and some more fun people to embark on fun adventures with us!
• Live Shows! We are musical theatre kids, after all, the stage is our home! We hope to make connections with listeners and potential new friends! (Post Covid-19, of course!)

• Pay our team! As of right now, we are pouring our time, sweat, money and tears into this project's success. ""Tabletop Tiddies"" is not only our passion project but also the outlet we found to let our creative juices flow and share our craft with others during this weird, uncertain time.

Every little bit helps!

 

What You Get 

Every donation has its perks! Here's what we have in store for you:

$5 - A shout-out on our website!

$10 - A handwritten letter + above!

$20 - A NPC designed and named by you + above!

$35 - Indiegogo exclusive merch + above!

$45 - A personal shout out on an episode! Want to send a special someone a message? Wish them a happy birthday or anniversary? Want help confessing your undying love? We got you covered! (+ above!) (We reserve the right to deny a message for any reason!)

$60 - Access to an exclusive Zoom chat with the cast! Have questions? Want juicy spoilers? You know what to do! (Date TBD) (+ handwritten letter + a NPC designed by you + custom merch + shout out on our website!)

$200 - Out of canon ONE SHOT with the players! (+ handwritten letter + a NPC designed by you + custom merch + shout out on our website!)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

BE OUR FRIEND! Listen to the podcast! Tabletop Tiddies is a weekly podcast and will be launching on Thursday, November 5th, 2020!   

GET THE WORD OUT! Share the campaign! Follow us on social media: @tabletoptiddies on Facebook, Instagram &
column2:
Twitter! Share our posts! Talk about it with your friends and family! We will be forever in your debt!

LET US HEAR FROM YOU!  Do you have any suggestions as to how we can improve? We would love to hear your thoughts!

We also promise to regularly update you on our progress and immediately alert our pledges of any issues should any arise.

Where it all started

I wanted to find a way to get people to converse more so that they have a better understanding of the person the consider close to them.  Even in my own personal life, I feel like I'm close to some people that in all actuality...I may not even know that well..sounds weird right?

So I thought, maybe I could make a game that would help people to learn new things and maybe revisit old things about either their best friend or romantic partner. This game will make you listen and truly try to understand you partner a little more, thus helping the relationship grow and have a little healthy competition with other people as well.
What is CoupleUp?

CoupleUp is a exciting party card game geared toward bringing those you feel closest to you, even closer through thought provoking and eye opening questions that will bring you joy while answering.  There are four categories of cards with specific questions or phrases that pertain to you that must be answered by your partner. Each question has points on the bottom depending on the difficulty of the question.

Make your way  through the cards answering some easy, maybe hard and other revealing questions about your partner that you may or may not know. The team with the most points at the end of the round wins the game!
HOW TO PLAY!
Players will divide themselves into team of two players each and place the four decks of cards on the playing surface logo side up.
One player from a team will roll the die and pick up the card that corresponds with what was rolled.
The player that rolled the die will read the card then answer on a sheet of paper within 20 seconds. After 10 seconds your partner must answer with what they think you wrote down.

If they get the answer correct, that team will be rewarded the amount of points on the bottom of the card. Keep the cards you answer in a discard pile for your team. Repeat this step until all players have gone 5 times.
The team with the most points at the end of the round wins the game!
Why we're doing a indiegogo

We subscribe to the philosophy: Start small. Think big. Scale fast. We want to take CoupleUp to the next level and we need your help to do it. There are two reasons we have chosen to do a Indiegogo campaign.
1.) We want to do a larger run of our game so that we can get the cost per unit down.
2.) We want to bring CoupleUp fun to as many people as possible! While play testing the game this year, many supporters encouraged us to do Indiegogo to raise awareness and sales for our game.
We have had a great time bringing CoupleUp to the people we love. Now we are ready to bring it to the world!
Meet the cards
<h3>Risks &amp

Here's the thing....I'm not part of some big board game production company. I'm just a guy who enjoys learning more about people through the asking of questions and found out there's a way to make some fun out of it.
For CoupleUp, I already have prototypes printed, and have a great relationship with a reputable printing company to get started as soon as the campaign is complete.

I can't promise that there will be no set backs or that I wont encounter some situation where an unexpected delay hits me in the face. What I can promise, though, is that I will be honest about any issues we encounter, and will do my absolute best to rectify any problems that comes my way to make sure you are satisfied.
Other Ways You Can Help

Please do not hesitate to share on all social media platforms, phone or even pigeon mail if you are into that kind of thing. Tell all of your friends to get their own copy, as you won’t be loaning yours to anyone, because we all know people never return things, right? Every little bit helps. Don't forget to bookmark the website so you can see what we add in the future! Check the website www.coupleupgame.com
Twitter-@CoupleUpgame
Instagram- @Coupleupcardgam
Send us a note! jpeteet@coupleupgame.com

I wanted to find a way to get people to converse more so that they have a better understanding of the person the consider close to them.  Even in my own personal life, I feel like I'm close to some people that in all actuality...I may not even know that well..sounds weird right?

So I thought, maybe I could make a game that would help people to learn new things and maybe revisit old things about either their best friend or romantic partner. This game will make you listen and truly try to understand you partner a little more, thus helping the relationship grow and have a little healthy competition with other people as well.
What is CoupleUp?

CoupleUp is a exciting party card game geared toward bringing those you feel closest to you, even closer through thought provoking and eye opening questions that will bring you joy while answering.  There are four categories of cards with specific questions or phrases that pertain to you that must be answered by your partner. Each question has points on the bottom depending on the difficulty of the question.

Make your way  through the cards answering some easy, maybe hard and other revealing questions about your partner that you may or may not know. The team with the most points at the end of the round wins the game!
HOW TO PLAY!
Players will divide themselves into team of two players each and place the four decks of cards on the playing surface logo side up.
One player from a team will roll the die and pick up the card that corresponds with what was rolled.
The player that rolled the die will read the card then answer on a sheet of paper within 20 seconds. After 10 seconds your partner must answer with what they think you wrote down.

If they get the answer correct, that team will be rewarded the amount of points on the bottom of the card. Keep the cards you answer in a discard pile for your team. Repeat this step until all players have gone 5 times.
The team with the most points at the end of the round wins the game!
Why we're doing a indiegogo

We subscribe to the philosophy: Start small. Think big. Scale fast. We want to take CoupleUp to the next level and we need your help to do it. There are two reasons we have chosen to do a Indiegogo campaign.
1.) We want to do a larger run of our game so that we can get the cost per unit down.
2.) We want to bring CoupleUp fun to as many people as possible! While play testing the game this year, many supporters encouraged us to do Indiegogo to raise awareness and sales for our game.
We have had a great time bringing CoupleUp to the people we love. Now we are ready to bring it to the world!
Meet the cards
Risks & Challenges

Here's the thing....I'm not part of some big board game production company. I'm just a guy who enjoys learning more about people through the asking of questions and found out there's a way to make some fun out of it.
For CoupleUp, I already have prototypes printed, and have a great relationship with a reputable printing company to get started as soon as the campaign is complete.

I can't promise that there will be no set backs or that I wont encounter some situation where an unexpected delay hits me in the face. What I can promise, though, is that I will be honest about any issues we encounter, and will do my absolute best to rectify any problems that comes my way to make sure you are satisfied.
Other Ways You Can Help

Please do not hesitate to share on all social media platforms, phone or even pigeon mail if you are into that kind of thing. Tell all of your friends to get their own copy, as you won’t be loaning yours to anyone, because we all know people never return things, right? Every little bit helps. Don't forget to bookmark the website so you can see what we add in the future! Check the website www.coupleupgame.com
Twitter-@CoupleUpgame
Instagram- @Coupleupcardgam
Send us a note! jpeteet@coupleupgame.com",13.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Cheltenham, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/coupleup/pica

Hello, my name is Maxim, i am an owner of Shanti design studio. We do like working with titanium, as a team of professionals we made a lot of different custom items like titanium souvenirs, fidget, spinners etc.
Skull clicker was created to keep my hands busy cause a do fidget a lot, moreover, I wanted to show how wire EDM cutting is precise. 
For the last few months we made about 50 custom orders of the Skull clicker. We have a reliable factory to make most of the production steps.
Skull slicker production requires many tech processes and different kind of expensive machines like EDM cutter, CNC turning, milling machines that is why we need your support, together we will cut production cost to a minimum and make this cool fidget toy affordable.
Most of our customers are very satisfied with Skull clicker quality and figetability.
We have a lot of shipping experience (selling and shipping more than 500 different items internationally) so you will get your product exactly on time.

<h2 style=""text-align: center
<ul>
• We are Matt Longley and Pete Brown, the creators of Hoopsters, a basketball-themed board game that we created 17 years ago over brown bag lunches and big dreams.
• We are both hoops fans and creatives that have a great idea and concept for a fun and innovative board game, but just need a little help getting it to market!

• We are looking for the chance to get this game to the next level, to see this simple idea we sketched up on notebook paper over peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, have a chance to make it to market and become a reality!
<h3>What We Need &amp
<ul>
• After 17 years and hundreds of games played, we're able and eager to get Hoopsters in front of game development professionals! Help us get to the Chicago Toy and Game Fair this November!

• Your pledge will get you one of the first sets of Hoopsters! Ideally, we will strike a deal with a manufacturer or publisher, but if not, we'll continue to make Hoopsters sets by hand to fulfill your perk.
The Impact

This is a HUGE opportunity for us.  We have developed the game to a point that it is ready for a successful pitch.  This convention allows us to maximize our chances since it will be multiple companies that will be present.  Everyone has a dream and at times, we need a little boost to get there.  This is the boost we need to make this happen!
The exposure and experience we could get from this event will be invaluable as we continue our quest to get  Hoopsters to the masses!  Let's do this!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute, but if you could share this out on your social media outlets, that would be awesome! Any help you can provide, we appreciate! ","HOOPSTERS!

Introducing the world's first and only totally flat D20!  Here's how it works:
column3:
showinfo=0"">
 
Put it together with ease and VOILA! A dependable d20 metal sculpture born of your own two hands, which you can use in your games to the total awe and wonder of your tabletop gaming friends. 
 

The story of the Tin20 is both ridiculous and charming. Dave and I (Joel here), were driving back from picking up a 3D printer when we started discussing ""laser cutting"" on higher-end printers. That gave me the the idea of designing dice shapes which you could fold and use at the gaming table. I said ""Ooh... Dave! We could design origami dice which fold into the shape you want from a flat sheet!"" To which Dave replied ""Ooh!  you know what's a great idea!? We could totally make like... a foldable dice shape that you kinda, create from a sheet of laser-cut metal!!"". To which I answered... ""So.. like... What I just suggested?"". To which Dave replied... ""Oh... Yeah. I guess it's the same thing"". LOLz. 

That set us upon a path to discovering the process and designs of metal puzzle figures and 2 months of prototyping later, HERE WE ARE!! The Tin20 is ready for the big-leagues!

Financial Goal: With the logistics and manufacturing partners in place, we're set to deliver these awesome Tin20s to our backers after reaching a humble $1,000 CAD. We really just need to get a bit of funding in place to make sure we can get these into our warehouse.

Do or die? We recently completed our first small order of these products and know that the manufacturer can deliver us any quantity we need in a reasonable amount of time.  We are confident that wether we move 1 or 1,000 we will be able to fulfill on your order.

$100,000 - ""BOULDER"" SIZE UNLOCKED!!

At $100,000 raised, We'll give you the option of selecting either Small or Large sizes at NO EXTRA COST. This will happen via the Crowdox Pledge Manager after the campaign has ended. Here are the two sizes which will be made available when we unlock this stretch goal.

$200,000 - d4, d6 AND d8 DESIGNS UNLOCKED!

At $200,000 raised, we will design and make available d4s, d6s, and d8s which you'll be able to select from the pledge manager AFTER the campaign. 

Hi! We're Joel &
column4: Dave, your Mythroll Armorists. We aim to arm you (our Mythrollers, the most crucial members of the team) with the most unique items for your tabletop gameplay. Individually we've run and sold several businesses, invested in businesses, worked and consulted in the charity sector, and together, we share a massive love for crowdfunding, and Tabletop RPG gaming with Dungeons &amp
column5:
Dragons being our escapism of choice. Join us!  

Here's our new packaging!
(Request some for the front counter of your Friendly Local Game Store!)

It's not intended to stay that flat, but it is 100% totally flat when you get it. Yay!

We've been hard at work ramping up our logistics and pick-pack'n'ship processes to speed up delivery to customers, even in the midst of the worldwide pandemic. We do, on occasion have to communicate delays in shipment to the customer due to warehouse-floor issues such as insufficient packaging. On these occasions, we've been very forthright with our supporters and will continue to be transparent in all of our limitations or obstacles.

Greek Gardens

 

This is a collection of Greek-inspired terrain pieces designed for 28mm tabletop adventures. Build beautiful gardens for your adventurers to explore.

The set is inspired by Greek Architecture with a mix of fantasy plant growth. Several pieces come with an overgrowth or destroyed variant so your garden can experience change over time or during battle. Switch out a piece that gets hit by a magic missile for it's destroyed variant or leave the garden unattended and let the vines take over!
Check out the set!
If you have any questions about the set please let me know. All pieces have been test printed on an Ender 3.

This is the party game you have been waiting for!
Bye Bye Liver: The Party Game™ mixes 12+ years of drinking and live comedy into one game, with over 150 Cards and 5 Great Drinking Games for you and your lush friends.

Your friends and party-goers will laugh and scream as each round surprises you with its fast, uproarious and unrelenting gameplay. From classics, such as Never Have I Ever and Would You Rather, to originals like Beer-Roulette and Get F#@ked, there is never a dull moment as you await the next turn of a card or roll of the dice.
Bye Bye Liver is THE Party Game. Whether it’s 4 or 40 people, you are sure to have a legendary night every time you play.
Proven, Hilarious, and Easy to Play…this is your ticket to an impossible-to-forget night!

Why play one drinking game when you can play them all? With our special mix, you never know what you're going to get! The game has 150 Cards, 2 Dice and endless ways to make your best friends blush. Enjoy rollicking rounds of Would You Rather, Never Have I Ever, Most Likely To and Get F*cked, which includes games like Waterfall, Beer Roulette, King's Cup and more.

Is Bye Bye Liver: The Party Game hard to play? No. Not unless you're an idiot. We know you don't have a lot of time to learn a game, but you DO want to get your friends drunk and laughing. Here's how to play:
That's it! 10 Easy Steps to the perfect beginning to your night out...or in!
150 Cards, Dice, and endless laughs.
THE perfect way to start or end any night.
With this, you get the full game and our first expansion, The Deck Too Far!
A value of $35 for just $35!
Look, sometimes in the writer’s room there are moments when something is pitched and everyone laughs and then immediately goes, “So...we agree that will never make it in, right?
We call those Nope cards.
This expansion says Yes to those Nopes.
We apologize for nothing. You ordered it. You get it. Strap in.
So, we’ve invented a thing we call a “Shot Glass.”
With this, you can transport over 1.5 ounces of any beverage from the table to your mouth!

Better yet, it’s got a bit of humor on it, so when someone notices you taking a shot and asks about it, you can break the ice by telling them, “Shut up, it’s none of your fucking business is what my glass says.”
And then you can show them your personalized Dirty Limerick that we wrote for you to make up for being so rude.
We just added a T-shirt! And not just any T-Shirt*, this is the official Bye Bye Liver “Rated D for Drunk”  shirt!
It’s honest, let’s people know what they can expect and be forewarned. It does not absolve you of anything you do, however, and cannot prevent brownouts.
Also, you will get a filthy picture drawn by one of our team. It will probably be terrible.
It will definitely be autographed. It will not be erotic. Don’t expect that.

Byron Hatfield created Bye Bye Liver in 2006 in Chicago. It has since become a national show, performed and loved nationally in the US and Canada. He owned The Public House Theatre in Chicago until 2018. He now lives in Atlanta where he continues to write and produce and is currently working on his first feature film. He feels very blessed by his success and by the wonderful people that have been around to help is grow at every stage.

Patrick Lothian met Byron while working on the Chicago internet television network Maybe Hip. This led to them working together on small film projects including the TV pilot The Show Might Go On. He lives with his wife and two dogs in Knoxville and is a web and graphic designer.

Sasha Hatfield  is a content contributor, editor and writer-wrangler, responsible for Byron's best ideas. She is an award-watching actress, best known for insurance commercials, video games and ""Bye Bye Liver: The Boston Drinking Play."" All butt and poop jokes are lovingly dedicated to Sasha and Byron's 3-year-old.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
WHO WE ARE

Let us introduce ourselves, Drs Nikolay and Olga Bogatyrev. We are biologists and experts in creativity and innovation techniques inspired by nature. We advise businesses and agencies, run the workshops and deliver lectures in the universities all around the world. We are STEM ambassadors and dedicate our free time giving talks at schools.
We believe that the best way to learn is to play. Two years ago we successfully launched our first card games “INVENTORIUM”, which is focused on the development of creative thinking for adults.

column2: />Now we have developed a series of games for children to teach them to love nature and to develop scientific curiosity in a fun way. BUZZness is the first game from this series and it is all about bumblebees, plants and holistic thinking.

column1: We have gathered a team of amazing experts, who have helped us to make the illustrations, do graphic design, shoot photo and video sessions. They made for us endless cups of coffee and supported us in the moments of blue.
ALL ABOUT BUZZness

BUZZness is a deck of 88 cards which are beautifully illustrated by the biologists and artists from the UK, Russia and Belgium. It does not take up much room but contains the endless amount of fun. It’s a brilliant present for your children or their friends. The game is full of colours and would wake up the interest in biology.

BUZZness card games teach holistic thinking and an understanding of the basic law of ecology: nobody lives alone and everyone contributes to the wealth of the place where they live. Competition and the cooperation of bumblebees and plants work for the benefit of the whole meadow.
In the
column3: product_id=112"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">booklet, which you will have  together with the game, we have added lots of facts about bumblebees and flowers. Reading it will make your child want to learn more and they will start doing their own researches. You will find out lots about bumblebees, such as their difference from the bees, their habits and habitats, where do they live and who is the bumblebee Queen. Your children will learn if the bumblebees sting or if they produce honey. How they speak and how you can help them, if you find a bumblebee in distress.

column1: All of that is presented in the way, which is interesting and easy to read for a child.
WHY WE ARE HERE
Our team volunteered their time,  shared knowledge and talents. We have invested our own money into the first small trial production of the BUZZness.
What we propose

We are planning to pass the game on to schools free of charge, so children could play in BUZZness while they are at their after-school clubs. Teaches can use the cards as learning facilities at their lessons as well.
How we are going to do this

First of all we need to print enough copies of the game. Your help will give the opportunity to print at least 300 copies to start with. Then we will approach School Governing Boards to rise the interest. We plan to write articles for STEM newsletter as well. BUZZness cards and videos will also be placed on teaching resource platforms such as TES , British Council, School Education Gateway.

Our volunteers will approach  schools in the UK to introduce the game. We also are going to participate in Educational Trade Shows in the UK. Social media  is very helpful to spread the word about BUZZness game and collect orders from the teaches who would like to try the cards at their lessons. BUZZness cards will be sent by post worldwide.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >We need your help to make a start and very soon you will find BUZZness in the main shops.

column1: BUDGET BREAKDOWN.

To be able to give cards for free to the schools and Table Games clubs in the UK (and if we get enough funds – all over the world!) we plan to produce 300 copies of the game. We are facing the following costs:
<ul>
<li>
Production costs: £1665. We are collaborating with excellent Print House in Bulgaria.
<li>
Logistics .Transport of the stock  and packaging) £117
<li>
Travel. To help our volunteers to travel while visiting should and afterschool game clubs - £ 300
<li>
Postal expenses – Royal Mail £3.45 - £10.15 per parcel depending on the country of destination (250 parcels can be sent, 50 boxes delivered in person). Postal costs will vary from £862.5  to  £2537.5
<li>

Video production. To produce  three educational videos where laws of ecology are described and game rules explained -  £7150.This includes the cost of 25 working days of a camera man and  an editor for all three video - 6250  (£ 250 day rate) plus stock video purchases - £900
• All above takes us to the sum of 11769.50 which we hope you help us to raise.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >We will be very grateful for any donation, small or big (especially big!)

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >Thank you for looking at our page and your interest to the new card games BUZZness.

We believe that the best way to learn is to play. Two years ago we successfully launched our first card games “INVENTORIUM”, which is focused on the development of creative thinking for adults.

Now we have developed a series of games for children to teach them to love nature and to develop scientific curiosity in a fun way. BUZZness is the first game from this series and it is all about bumblebees, plants and holistic thinking.

We have gathered a team of amazing experts, who have helped us to make the illustrations, do graphic design, shoot photo and video sessions. They made for us endless cups of coffee and supported us in the moments of blue.
ALL ABOUT BUZZness

BUZZness is a deck of 88 cards which are beautifully illustrated by the biologists and artists from the UK, Russia and Belgium. It does not take up much room but contains the endless amount of fun. It’s a brilliant present for your children or their friends. The game is full of colours and would wake up the interest in biology.

BUZZness card games teach holistic thinking and an understanding of the basic law of ecology: nobody lives alone and everyone contributes to the wealth of the place where they live. Competition and the cooperation of bumblebees and plants work for the benefit of the whole meadow.
A winner creates the largest eco-garden!

In the booklet, which you will have  together with the game, we have added lots of facts about bumblebees and flowers. Reading it will make your child want to learn more and they will start doing their own researches. You will find out lots about bumblebees, such as their difference from the bees, their habits and habitats, where do they live and who is the bumblebee Queen. Your children will learn if the bumblebees sting or if they produce honey. How they speak and how you can help them, if you find a bumblebee in distress.
All of that is presented in the way, which is interesting and easy to read for a child.
WHY WE ARE HERE
Our team volunteered their time,  shared knowledge and talents. We have invested our own money into the first small trial production of the BUZZness.
What we propose

We are planning to pass the game on to schools free of charge, so children could play in BUZZness while they are at their after-school clubs. Teaches can use the cards as learning facilities at their lessons as well.
How we are going to do this

First of all we need to print enough copies of the game. Your help will give the opportunity to print at least 300 copies to start with. Then we will approach School Governing Boards to rise the interest. We plan to write articles for STEM newsletter as well. BUZZness cards and videos will also be placed on teaching resource platforms such as TES , British Council, School Education Gateway.

Our volunteers will approach  schools in the UK to introduce the game. We also are going to participate in Educational Trade Shows in the UK. Social media  is very helpful to spread the word about BUZZness game and collect orders from the teaches who would like to try the cards at their lessons. BUZZness cards will be sent by post worldwide.
We need your help to make a start and very soon you will find BUZZness in the main shops.
BUDGET BREAKDOWN.

To be able to give cards for free to the schools and Table Games clubs in the UK (and if we get enough funds – all over the world!) we plan to produce 300 copies of the game. We are facing the following costs:
Production costs: £1665. We are collaborating with excellent Print House in Bulgaria.
Logistics .Transport of the stock  and packaging) £117
Travel. To help our volunteers to travel while visiting should and afterschool game clubs - £ 300
Postal expenses – Royal Mail £3.45 - £10.15 per parcel depending on the country of destination (250 parcels can be sent, 50 boxes delivered in person). Postal costs will vary from £862.5  to  £2537.5

Video production. To produce  three educational videos where laws of ecology are described and game rules explained -  £7150.This includes the cost of 25 working days of a camera man and  an editor for all three video - 6250  (£ 250 day rate) plus stock video purchases - £900
All above takes us to the sum of 11769.50 which we hope you help us to raise.
We will be very grateful for any donation, small or big (especially big!)
Thank you for looking at our page and your interest to the new card games BUZZness.",4.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Bath, United Kingdom",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/buzzness-card-games-to-spark-interest-to-science/pica
0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
Eres un gobernante que quiere lo mejor para su país: salud, educación, ingreso, equidad...

Al mismo tiempo, ves cómo en todo el mundo las actividades humanas están acabando con los recursos naturales y acelerando el cambio climático.  Sabes que no podemos seguir así, pero ¿qué puedes hacer?

Mejorar el bienestar de la población sin que se dispare el consumo de recursos naturales y las emisiones que contribuyen al cambio climático: éste es el mayor desafío que enfrenta la humanidad, y es el que deberás asumir al jugar ECOPOLIS!
Número de jugadores: 2-5
Edades: 10+
Duración: 60 minutos
ECOPOLIS no es un juego de trivia, es un juego de toma de decisiones sobre políticas de país.
Objetivo de juego: Ser el primer país en llegar a la meta, un espacio en el tablero donde el Desarrollo Humano es muy alto, y el Consumo de Recursos Naturales es muy bajo (sostenible).
Se trata esencialmente de una carrera hacia el desarrollo verdaderamente sostenible...
¿Cómo jugar?

El tablero de ECOPOLIS funciona como una cuadrícula donde te puedes mover en cualquier sentido: arriba-abajo representa el nivel de Consumo de Recursos, e izquierda-derecha el nivel de Desarrollo Humano.

Para avanzar hacia la meta deberás invertir tu ingreso nacional en diferentes cartas de Política Pública que están a tu disposición. ¿Construir más carreteras?  ¿Aumentar la escolarización?  ¿Promover las energías renovables? ¿Incrementar el turismo?... Cada una de estas políticas tendrá efectos únicos sobre tus niveles de Desarrollo Humano y Consumo de Recursos (acercándote o alejándote de la meta).

La clave está en pensar muy bien antes de decidir qué Política implementar. ¿Aumentará o disminuirá el Desarrollo Humano de tu país?... ¿Hará que la población consuma más o menos Recursos?... Usualmente algo se gana y algo se pierde. Necesitarás toda tu inteligencia eco-lógica y algo de suerte, porque es cierto que las cartas determinan tus probabilidades, pero el resultado final está condicionado por un lanzamiento de los dados (factor de incertidumbre).

En cada turno también tendrás que negociar cooperación internacional con tus oponentes para generar ingresos extra e intentar reducir el consumo global de recursos. Acá, los jugadores interesados en la carta que vas a implementar entran en una guerra de ofertas para poder compartir contigo los beneficios de dicha política.
Además, en ECOPOLIS podrás:

Enfrentar Eventos Inesperados:  Estas son cartas que tomas al azar y que representan eventos que ocurren en tu país sin que los hayas planificado (y sin que te cuesten dinero). Ellas te pueden favorecer (lo más probable), como en el caso de innovaciones tecnológicas, o te pueden perjudicar (a veces), como cuando te golpea un desastre natural o una huelga laboral.

Acumular y usar Cartas de Propulsión: Debes trabajar para obtener estas cartas, las cuales se juegan en combinación con las cartas de Política y mejoran su desempeño (por ejemplo, reduciendo la corrupción gubernamental o aumentando la equidad social).  Algunas de ellas también te darán la opción de declarar la guerra o exportar tu contaminación a otros jugadores...  No es exactamente lo que el planeta necesita, pero -en el contexto de este juego- puede ser muy divertido.
Acumular e intercambiar Eco-créditos: ¿no necesitas bajar tu Consumo en este momento? Obtén eco-créditos y guárdalos para más tarde o negócialos con otros jugadores!

column5: '>Breve historia de ECOPOLIS

column1: ECOPOLIS fue creado en Panamá por Andrés Tarté, luego de madurar por mucho tiempo una idea que le dio su padre: ""la gente no está captando la importancia de este asunto, ¿por qué no diseñamos un juego para crear conciencia sobre el desarrollo sostenible?""

La resultante dinámica de juego es 100% original e imita lo que suele ocurrir cuando los países navegan el camino de su desarrollo. Esta dinámica fue obtenida gracias a un análisis estadístico de más de 700 indicadores de desempeño para 140 países.* Así, los jugadores pueden visualizar las conexiones –no siempre obvias– entre diferentes políticas de desarrollo y el bienestar humano, el consumo de recursos naturales y la emisión de gases de efecto invernadero.

La iniciativa fue incubada desde sus inicios por el Centro Internacional para el Desarrollo Sostenible (CIDES) de la Ciudad del Saber.  Posteriormente ha recibido apoyo oficial para su desarrollo de parte del Banco Interamericano de Desarrollo (BID), la Secretaría Nacional de Ciencia, Tecnología e Innovación (SENACYT), la Universidad Tecnológica de Panamá (UTP) y el Ministerio de Ambiente de Panamá (MiAMBIENTE).

Ahora, luego de completar con éxito las fases de diseño, prototipaje y prueba, incluyendo extensas iteraciones de juego y talleres –tanto en Panamá como en los EEUU– con estudiantes de escuelas y universidades, ONGs y profesionales en el área de medio ambiente y desarrollo sostenible, y grupos de aficionados a los juegos de mesa, ECOPOLIS está listo para llegar al público y convertirse en el juego de mesa para nuestros tiempos.

*De forma simultánea al lanzamiento del juego se publicará un libro electrónico que contiene todo lo que necesitas saber sobre el análisis que alimenta el juego, incluyendo fuentes de datos, metodología, conexión con los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible (ODS) e hipótesis que explican las correlaciones encontradas.
ECOPOLIS y la educación ambiental basada en juegos

ECOPOLIS no solo brinda experiencias inolvidables en lo recreativo, sino también en lo académico. Familiares, amigos, estudiantes o colaboradores de todas las edades  pueden jugar mientras exploran conceptos y participan en conversaciones significativas.

Es sabido que los patrones de desarrollo humano están amenazando seriamente los recursos naturales de nuestro planeta. No obstante, muchas personas aún tienen dificultades para comprender por qué y cómo está sucediendo esto. Pero la gran mayoría de soluciones educativas existentes suelen ser unidireccionales y pasivas, lo que dificulta captar el interés de su público objetivo.

Los juegos serios como ECOPOLIS ofrecen una alternativa para remediar esta situación. Su efectividad ha sido comprobada alrededor del mundo, y la oferta se encuentra en pleno crecimiento, rumbo a convertirse en uno de los pilares en el futuro de la educación.

Las sesiones de juego y Talleres con ECOPOLIS promueven una nueva forma de ver las cosas, donde el desarrollo se basa en una relación más consciente entre el ser humano y los recursos naturales que le sostienen. Además, crean un ambiente fértil para el intercambio de conocimientos, las preguntas y la reflexión, y ayudan a potenciar las capacidades de decisión y liderazgo de los participantes dentro de sus organizaciones y comunidades.

Si usted es docente escolar o universitario, o representante de una ONG o de una entidad gubernamental y le gustaría utilizar ECOPOLIS en sus programas educativos/sociales, no dude en escribirnos al siguiente correo: raul@habitat.games.
¿Cuál es el objetivo de esta Campaña?

Los fondos recaudados acá se utilizarán para imprimir y publicar la primera edición de ECOPOLIS, en español, enfocada en el mercado panameño (la edición en inglés será manejada por separado en otra campaña internacional a principios de 2019 -que también incluirá la versión en español- con envíos a todo el el mundo).  Específicamente, buscamos costear:
<ul>
• Fabricación del mínimo de unidades necesarias para un primer tiraje,
• Transporte e introducción a Panamá,
• Gastos de campaña (tarifas de Indiegogo y un mínimo de marketing online), y
• Elaboración de la edición artesanal de colección que se ofrece como recompensa en esta campaña.

Queremos que este juego luzca espectacular y que goce de una larga vida contigo. En otras palabras, buscamos la más alta calidad en los materiales y en el acabado. Por esto estamos trabajando con Ad Magic Games, una de las principales empresas independientes de fabricación de juegos de mesa en el mundo. Además, está certificada por el Consejo Nacional de Empresas de Mujeres (WBENC por sus siglas en inglés) de los EEUU, y utiliza un 20% de material reciclado en sus productos (este porcentaje es el más alto que encontramos en la industria, y esperamos que en un futuro la cifra siga en aumento).
Sobre Habitat Games

Habitat Games es el nombre que lleva este emprendimiento social. Somos un estudio de diseño de juegos serios y herramientas lúdicas que buscan crear consciencia sobre los asuntos más urgentes que enfrenta la humanidad, promoviendo el pensamiento ecológico y la cultura de la sostenibilidad.

De exceder nuestras expectativas para esta campaña, los fondos nos permitirían ordenar una mayor cantidad de unidades de ECOPOLIS para colocar en el mercado y distribuir entre instituciones académicas y programas sociales. Esto nos ayudaría enormemente a avanzar en el diseño y publicación de los demás innovadores juegos que tenemos pensados (todos siguiendo la temática del desarrollo sostenible y con mecánicas basadas en conocimiento científico).

Entre nuestro planes futuros también está la producción de una versión digital de ECOPOLIS (app). Nos gusta mucho la interacción cara a cara que ofrecen los juegos de mesa impresos, pero también estamos concientes de que lo digital ofrece algunas ventajas, como la comodidad de jugar remotamente, un menor impacto ambiental (con la posibilidad de distribuir el juego sin incurrir en gastos de materiales y transporte), y facilidad para explorar fuentes de datos.
<h3><span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column2: >¡Sé una voz por la sostenibilidad y el futuro de la humanidad!

column1: Al apoyar el lanzamiento de ECOPOLIS, además de ser una de las primeras personas en llevarte a casa este juego, le estarás dando un voto de confianza al ecosistema de innovación y emprendimiento social de Panamá.

Ayúdanos a correr la voz sobre ECOPOLIS compartiendo esta campaña en línea con familiares, amigos, aficionados a los juegos, personas famosas, influencers y seres humanos en general. Y si conoces a profesores o directivos de escuelas y universidades, u organizaciones que trabajan en programas de educación y sostenibilidad, este juego es para ellos! Tu referencia será fundamental para que ECOPOLIS pueda llegar a más personas alrededor del mundo.

Por último, confiamos que tu compromiso con la educación para el desarrollo sostenible no terminará acá, sino que seguirás tomando acciones para crear conciencia, estudiar y aplicar alternativas más sostenibles en tu día a día. Puede que esta campaña no llegue a su meta, pero lo que no puede quedarse corto es nuestro deber colectivo de preservar las condiciones que permiten al ser humano habitar -y prosperar- en este planeta. Recuerda, no hay planeta B.
¡Gracias por ser parte de esta aventura!
El equipo de Habitat Games.
Créditos
Andrés Tarté   diseño de juego
Stephanie Sanz   diseño de arte / diseño gráfico
Luis F. Sosa   diseño gráfico / animación / diseño 3D
Jonathan Guerra   diseño 3D
Christoph Hebeler Jols.   diseño y fabicación de edición artesanal
Raúl Chang   coordinador de proyectos
También puedes seguirnos en tu red favorita (Instagram, Facebook y Twitter: @playecopolis)

Puede que esta campaña no llegue a su meta, pero lo que no puede quedarse corto es nuestro deber colectivo de preservar las condiciones que permiten al ser humano habitar -y prosperar- en este planeta. Recuerda, no hay planeta B.
¡Gracias por ser parte de esta aventura!
El equipo de Habitat Games.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
(Game Night Ready)™ Game Libraries

We only sell games that we love, that we know are great for game nights and parties. You can buy them in regular retail packaging, or packaged with accessories designed to make them... Well, you get the idea.

Tangibly, what that means is that we add things like premium card protectors, often in hard-to find-sizes, lamination for fragile papers, 'ex libris' labels to mark them as yours, and little things like extra zip-lock baggies, to keep everything organized and protected, and safe from your filthy beloved friends and customers.

Beyond individual games, this campaign is all about getting you an entire (Game Night Ready)™ Game Library (in a Bag, or in a Box)! It's ideal for a business that wants to host a regular game night for customers, individuals who want to start a game library from scratch, or as a wedding or housewarming gift!
TLDR:
<ul>
<li>
The Fourth Place makes game nights in a box, game libraries in a bag, and vice versa.
• Each full-size library kit comes with seven awesome games and more!
• We protect and accessorize the games to make them (Game Night Ready)™!
• Perks with ""Business"" in the name include a kit for success with a public game library and game night events. Other perks (except the non-""Business"" kit) are great for players too.
• Support us with a contribution, and get a perk like a t-shirt, a game night in a (smaller) box or some stickers!
The Fourth Place

I have always been passionate about spaces for geeks, whether that means small game nights with friends, shops where we can congregate, or huge conventions. I've been comics writer, created LARP events, and run geek-friendly teams at tech startups.

We all have a Third Place-- where, after home and work, we feel most comfortable. As a kid, it was the library and then the art room. On TV, we've watched people practically at live Cheers, The Bronze in Sunnydale, or Jitters.
The Fourth Place takes its name from that sense of being at home, plus some geeky concepts that are close to my heart:
<ul>
• Jack Kirby's cosmic comics set in the Fourth World
• Tales of Faerie as the Fourth Realm, after Earth, Heaven, and Hell
• The kind of gaming group where you still have a blast when you get Fourth Place.
With your help, places like coffee shops, restaurants, bars, B&
column2: Bs, community centers, dorms, and public libraries will be able to create a Fourth Place. Individuals will be able to jump-start their own game collection, or give one to a friend who has discovered games.

column1: The Fourth Place won't just be hundreds, or thousands, of little places-- it will become somewhere we can always find.
You Can Help-- and Reap the Rewards!
Curating a worthwhile game library and getting it (Game Night Ready)™ is a lot of work. Taking that hard work off of peoples' hands, and doing it right, will take time and money.

This campaign will allow us to produce our first round of game libraries, and keep prices down by getting the supplies in bulk. It will also directly get game libraries into the hands of business who will create great spaces, and people who want to share them.

Funding will go to buying the games, card protectors, lamination, promo stickers, owner and player guides, and stuff like markers, that go into each case. Without a campaign like this, buying all of those things at volume would be way beyond my humble budget, so prices would go up.

You will also help us be able to set up our online store, and a monthly subscription service for owners of the starter libraries, so each library can keep getting bigger and better, and the spaces we create with them can welcome more and more people!
What You Get - Game Libraries:

Each full-size game library starts with seven great tabletop games, including card games, board games, games for a bunch of players, games for a couple of players, games for adults, games for kids and teens, games for serious players, games for casual players, and everything in between. (Yeah, I've put a lot of thought into those seven games.)
Each game comes (Game Night Ready)™, with premium card protectors, laminated papers, an 'Ex Libris' label, and other add-ons like baggies and rubber bands.
Every kit comes with a custom The Fourth Place library box, the Gamefolio Vault Duffel Bag, or the full Init Gamefolio system including Gamefolio Cases.

Business kits come with high-quality vinyl promo stickers, guides for the owner and players, and some bonus stuff like markers. We also assemble the games and protectors to make sure they don't sit on your shelf until someone has time. Individual kits slim back on that stuff, but still include some The Fourth Place schwag.
Pricing &
Transparency time! You only pay MSRP for games and major accessories, plus our cost for any other accessories and materials, and get Free Shipping to the US and cheap shipping to Canada.

You can help out by buying your own game library, in a snazzy library box or an InIt Gamefolio Vault Duffel Bag or complete GameFolio System, by buying cool perks like a mini game night (two fully-accessorized games, plus one expansion), and with one-of-a-kind The Fourth Place merch to share your love of games and the spaces we create when we play them! If things go well, we can add subscription boxes and comic libraries too!
Terms &
Businesses purchasing any games or game libraries will need to agree to  Terms &
column2: Conditions for Businesses. The short version:

column1: Your responsibilities:
<ul>
• Don't resell the games, so we don't lose our reseller agreements.
• Use our branding when promoting your game event and library.
• Don't schedule opposite our other customers in your area.
Our responsibilities:
<ul>
• Track a calendar of events, to help promote your event and avoid scheduling conflicts.
• Limited number of kits per zip code to avoid over-saturation of competition.
• Prioritize everyone's success over individual sales.
<h3>Risks &amp

The primary way to contribute will be pre-ordering a game library for yourself, your business, or a friend. Your contribution will cover the cost of supplies, production, accessories, etc. for what you pledge for, even if this campaign doesn't get a huge response.

One Risk: The contents of the kits could change. Distribution rights and discounts are all set for a huge library of games and accessories, and suppliers for the stickers and custom boxes, but some things could change given the nature of the business. (That's why I haven't listed game titles.)

Another: It could take some time for your kit to get to you. At fairly low volumes, I can still be confident about delivering all rewards at these prices. Nothing should take more than a few weeks to arrive, but most things won't be ordered until the campaign ends.

Okay, One More: We're just one man, a cat, and a spokesminion at the moment. If this campaign is a huge success, the margins will get even better, making your rewards safer-- but it may take a bit longer to get everything together. On the other hand, if that happens, I expect to be able to include some extra surprises.
Every Little Bit Counts

Not everyone is going to be able to set aside a few hundred bucks for a kick*ss (Game Night Ready)™ Game Library. Some won't even be able to spare the money for a Game Night in a (Smaller) Box, or even a sticker pack. That's cool.

You can help us by donating a few bucks, by telling a friend about our campaign, by asking for one of our libraries or games for your next birthday or major holiday, by posting about the campaign on social media, or even by joining our little community on Facebook.
<div>
Thank you!
I couldn't do this without you, and I love you for it.

Project Summary
Premium Quality Playing Cards featuring Japanese themed artwork created by world famous artist Marine Loup.
Decks designed in collaboration with Craig Maidment and Marine Loup and feature added design features for card magic!.
Features include:
Level 1 Marking System (similar to a one way card backing design) that allows you to track/locate any selected card in the deck.
Multi Layer Stacked Deck with a number of powerful tricks built in to the deck that can easily be performed straight out of the pack, no skill level required!
Bonus Gaff Card (Gold King of Diamonds) for added card trickery
Hidden reveal inside base of tuck box

Invitation leaflet containing Q code link to a secret magic website that gives you access to learning some of the best kept secrets in card magic, as well as enabling you to unlock all the secrets to each deck in a complete range of magic trick decks to be available as a complete set of 4 decks, each having different secrets to card magic built into their design.
<h3>What We Need &amp
column2: What You will Get in return for supporting us here on Indiegogo.

column1: We are seeking a minimum of $1000 AUD to go toward helping cover manufacturing costs to produce these Gold Dragon Magic Trick Decks to complete our series of magic trick decks for the Black Dragon Series Of Playing Cards.

In return for your support you will be receiving one or more of these decks as a perk for helping us fund this project.  The amount of decks you will receive will depend on the Perk you select to help us out with reaching our target goal.

Why launch on Indiegogo?
We have had a great previous track record on Kickstarter with 3 previously successful Dragon Deck launches in Black, Green and Silver for this magic trick deck series....however, I would like to try launching our last deck for the deck set on Indiegogo to see what sort of response we will get from a new audience on a new crowdfunding platform!  Indiegogo seems to fit well for reputable brands seeking to launch new products that are ready to ship! Please help us reduce our printing costs from the manufacturers by pledging to support us here on indiegogo :)
<h3>Risks &amp

No risk involved, with designs complete, manufacturing and shipping partners in place and just need funding support to reduce our costs for manufacturing these decks.  We are very familiar with fulfillment of projects, with all of our successfully funded Kickstarter campaigns in the past being fulfilled ahead of schedule and we have also had great feedback from our supporters on the quality of our decks that they have recieved from previous Kickstarter projects.
Other Ways You Can Help

Short on funds right now?  That doesn't mean that you can't help us out.  See below for other ways you can help us to create these Gold Dragon Decks as well as support us with other decks that we have worked on, or plan to work on in the near future -
Here are other ways you can help -
<ul>
• Help get the word out for us and make some noise about our campaign.
• Use the Indiegogo share tools to help us!

• Make a purchase of one of our other decks from www.penguinmagic.com (Our other decks include Black Dragon , Green Dragon and Silver Dragon) or any of our decks from our Etsy store at https://www.etsy.com/au/shop/CLCPCStudio52 when you have some spare cash to buy some magic trick decks from us.
• Follow us on Kickstarter by clicking 'Follow Creator' from my Kickstarter page at https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/754282482/silver-dragon-playing-cards-standard-edition-magic
• Follow us from our design studio at - https://www.customplayingcardsclcpcstudio52.com/
• Follow us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/CLCPC-Studio-52-147053...
• Support us on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/vintagelabel

<td align=""center"" width=""50%""><h3 style=""color: #B70003
<div style=""text-align: center
Short Summary
Hi everyone, I'm Clive Robertson, proud father of 2 beautiful girls and the founder and creator of the worlds fastest, funniest active card game.
For over 25 years I have worked as a sports and physical therapist cumulating in working as a Personal Trainer and Sports Therapist, aswell as working for Newcastle United FC.
<div style=""text-align: center

However, it was my passion for supporting children who had a lack of fundamental play in my previous role,  working with toddler groups, focusing on their health and well being, that led to the creation and need for Snapfit.

I constantly had parents asking me to write down activities to play with their children at home. However, pieces of paper easily get lost and that's when a light bulb moment occurred, to create a simple, portable, accessible, cost effective, fun, active family card game which you can take anywhere and play anywhere.

As a child, my favourite game was snap. I knew we needed to create an atmosphere of  active fun and more importantly where families could meet on a common ground away from  children's tech and parents high priced gym costs along with precious time together. This is where the idea of SNAPFIT was born.
For years, parents have been looking for a fun active intervention to their child's sedentary lifestyle. SNAPFIT is the  answer, giving hilarious fun right here in a box.

The games industry has yet to focus on this concern where a lack of  active play in children has become  such an issue...…..Little Athlete Games have identified this through our range of unique products that will have you and your family laughing well after you have all have  played it.

Nothing can be more evident and important to us at Little Athlete Games than statistics showing over 340,000,000 children and adolescents between 5 and 19 years of age who are overweight and obese worldwide and a further 41,000,000 under the age of 5 years old are otherwise the same.

At our Little Athlete Games hub we knew something had to be done with regards to the health and well being of todays children who are locked into a more sedentary lifestyle, ever decreasing attention spans along with increased screen times.

With the increased risk of children's diabetes, breathing problems i.e. asthma , joint problems etc. We knew it was a problem worth helping to solve.....Welcome to the future of gameplay, Welcome to the world of SNAPFIT.....

With your Generous contributions we will be able to extend our product  range of games all of which will be contributing toward active gameplay where we feel will be invaluable to every child's health, fun and wellbeing.

At Little Athlete Games we have also identified that just over 14,000,000 people still locked in poverty across the UK alone gives rise to the lack of resources able to  help inactive families, that alongside ever decreasing green spaces and schools with ever decreasing school budgets given rise to a supplement of choice which is both accessible , cost effective , reliable , and relative.

We are THAT game of choice. An active card game where every child and parent will enjoy our box and where every parent can relate the game as a fun barometer for there child's health and well-being , which is both effective and cost effective.
SNAPFIT will be, with your help THE go to active card game for every household.
<h2>What We Need &amp
To reach our goal
WE NEED YOU!
With your generous help, by making a contribution, we will be able to get SNAPFIT on the shelf and produce our three brand range -

My First SNAPFIT  up to 3yrs old giving children their first taste in the active card game range where the journey starts for toddlers to begin learning about taking turns with others , improving socialization skills, gross and fine motor skills, controlled dynamic movement, improve balance, spatial awareness and numeracy, ….This is there one stop gym in a gym box where parent and toddler can have the most hilarious fun together.

SNAPFIT, 3+ is the original game that started the phenomenon, where even more fun and crazy actions dictate gameplay......in this box the fun is increased with more twists and turns than a pretzel where ANTICIPATION, REACTION and ACTION are all you need.

and the Third game in our range encourages the most difficult of age groups to enjoy an active lifestyle, the Teenies 9 yrs to 12 yrs.....we've all heard it …."" I CANT GET MY CHILD AWAY FROM THE TV SCREEN"" or THERE ALWAYS ON THE COMPUTER GAME"",  MY CHILD ISN,T AS ACTIVE AS THEY SHOULD BE ,even where "" MY CHILD FINDS CARD AND BOARD GAMES SIMPLY BORING......Well we feel that's a thing of the past and with your generous help we at Little Athlete Games will help to not only encourage but to help sustain your child's ability to have more fun while being more active.....
please input the amount you would like to contribute and click to support
PERKS
we are also offering discounts on purchases made whilst we are raising funds.
Boxes will be dispatched in January 2020
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
<ul>
• Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign...….
• Please share our Indiegogo link

And that's all there is to it.

SNAPFIT will be, with your help THE go to active card game for every household.
What We Need & What You Get
To reach our goal
WE NEED YOU!
With your generous help, by making a contribution, we will be able to get SNAPFIT on the shelf and produce our three brand range -

My First SNAPFIT  up to 3yrs old giving children their first taste in the active card game range where the journey starts for toddlers to begin learning about taking turns with others , improving socialization skills, gross and fine motor skills, controlled dynamic movement, improve balance, spatial awareness and numeracy, ….This is there one stop gym in a gym box where parent and toddler can have the most hilarious fun together.

SNAPFIT, 3+ is the original game that started the phenomenon, where even more fun and crazy actions dictate gameplay......in this box the fun is increased with more twists and turns than a pretzel where ANTICIPATION, REACTION and ACTION are all you need.

and the Third game in our range encourages the most difficult of age groups to enjoy an active lifestyle, the Teenies 9 yrs to 12 yrs.....we've all heard it …."" I CANT GET MY CHILD AWAY FROM THE TV SCREEN"" or THERE ALWAYS ON THE COMPUTER GAME"",  MY CHILD ISN,T AS ACTIVE AS THEY SHOULD BE ,even where "" MY CHILD FINDS CARD AND BOARD GAMES SIMPLY BORING......Well we feel that's a thing of the past and with your generous help we at Little Athlete Games will help to not only encourage but to help sustain your child's ability to have more fun while being more active.....
please input the amount you would like to contribute and click to support
PERKS
we are also offering discounts on purchases made whilst we are raising funds.
Boxes will be dispatched in January 2020
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign...….
Please share our Indiegogo link
And that's all there is to it.",4.0,2,"1 Campaign

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
How driven minds relax

I have experienced the debilitating effects of stress and anxiety first-hand over the past 15+ years. You lose your creativity, spontaneity, and any inclination towards risk. Life's boundaries draw inward as every muscle is silently clenched, waiting for the worst to happen. In other words - your ability to dream goes out the window. We need a world of dreamers, people who can see what isn't yet possible and are willing to risk everything to make their dreams a reality.

That's why I started Lemonade Pursuits puzzles. I believe in the mental power of solving a puzzle and the benefits that come from intentional focus, piece by piece. With every piece you place, your mind slowly unwinds, your perspective is renewed, and the impossible becomes possible again.

In pursuit of this mission, our jigsaw puzzles feature art that is not only visually appealing but also uses design elements that foster relaxation, lower blood pressure, and quiet the mind. We produce these puzzles collaboratively with incredibly talented artists and a portion of our sales go back to the contributing artists.
What makes our puzzles different:
1) Lemonade Pursuits puzzles feature art that uses design elements to foster relaxation and quiet the mind, such as natural fractals, seascapes, shades of blue, green landscapes and cheerful scenes.
2) Woman-owned. We’re working to even the playing field, one piece at a time.

3) We are collaborating with artists around the world (Susan Nethercote, Rachelle Kearns, Christa Rijneveld, and Andrea Caballero) to create these puzzles. 10% of all revenue goes back to the contributing artists.

4) Unlike most puzzles, Lemonade Pursuits puzzles are designed and manufactured in the U.S. We are proud of the fact that those that produce our puzzles make a living wage and work in good conditions.

5) We want to leave this Earth better than we found it. To achieve this, our puzzles and boxes are produced with recycled chipboard, artwork is printed with soy inks, and the shrink-wrap and plastic bag inside are made of biodegradable plastic.
Our puzzles are in production and will start shipping 11/29!
Other Ways You Can Help
Share with your friends!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook: @lemonadepursuits

0,"

 

Meru was a planet swarmed with dangerous predators. Demonic Dragons ruled Meru over millions of years until one day
column2:
a moving celestial object hit Meru. The collision was devastating for Meruan's. But when the dust settled, emerged a new civilization led by mighty king Arnoru. The origin of Arnoru is one of the most profound mysteries of Meru. Some believed he descended from the heavens, and some believe he was part of the celestial object. 

With his immense knowledge and power, Arnoru channeled his strength, wisdom, and ability to a book called Grendha. A powerful book of secrets that will unlock the demons and dark forces, conquer the dragon army and even worse, make anyone powerful enough to rule the Kingdom.

 

Grendha is a 1-4 Player fantasy Miniature war game happening on the planet Meru with epic arts, 244+ miniatures, Cards, Tokens, and Dice.

In this game, you represent one of the four heroes and will take part in the quest for the pages of Grendha to dictate Planet Meru. The gameplay includes territory conquering, fight &
column3:
negotiations, resource gathering, collect maps to help you capturing grendha pages, etc. At the starting of the game, you have no territories and have limited resources. Each turn, you must maximize the use of strength to capture territories and grendha pages, and overall, you will have a better strategy to the domain over others. 

The player who will conquer all territory or capture grendha pages will win the game.

 

In Grendha: Search for Lost Triumphs,  you take on the helm of one of the four powerful heroes. Along the way you conquer territories, face attack and defense, gather resources, collect maps to help you to achieve the Grendha pages. Your hero will need to slip through time to discover the lost pages to restore Grendha, The ultimate power!

 

A player will command their hero to move around the board, investigating new territories. When they enter a new zone, they will receive a territory card, and either faces a challenge or receive a boon.  The goal is to conquer and control and claim the lost leaves of Grendha. 

 

Each player needs to manage the strength of their character to move around the board, conquer territories, and face your opponents in battle. At any point, the player’s health is lowered to zero
column4:
they must admit defeat and remove from the game. 

After gaining control of territory, you must face a shield or sword encounter. The player then wins asset cards that provide increased stats, resources, or clues. Build a strong strategy by accumulating cards and using them at the right moment. 

Burn your strategy tokens to become allies, share resources, and army. But beware of your allies, because they can turn anytime against you. These warriors are mercenaries who will kill anyone to get to the leaves of the priceless book called Grendha. So no matter what army you are fielding, they will join your ranks. For a price! 

 

We have added additional Solo &
column5:
Co-op with the core box. Grendha solo/co-op mode offers an immersive adventure gaming experience of 4 heroes who are trying to save planet Meru from its creator, Arnoru. (This is still a work in progress)

The gameplay comes with 36 events using unique event cards, which is playable within 60-90 minutes. In solo/Co-op, the King targets each territory in the individual circumstances, and the four heroes have to save their areas and defeat Arnoru before the game ends. The surprise attack of King decides every turn of the players. This doesn't affect the present skirmish feature, but introducing additional solo/co-op is providing by adding new decks

Full Game Play

<div>We listened to the feedback given by the reviewers &amp
column2: our beloved supporters. We also have taken our insights from continued playtesting. Thanks for pointing out the typos in the first prototypes. We have inculcated all these to fine-tune and refine the game mechanics to bring to you the best gameplay experience possible. We are always committed to delivering the world a game that thrives on a monumental story fabricated on top of a strong strategic yet refreshingly fun game. Find the latest rulebook below to understand the game dynamics and detail

column1:
Grendha: Search for lost triumphs is an amazing story with satisfying gameplay.

For those of you new to IGG, an ""add-on"" is something that's not included with a regular pledge. If you're interested in getting the Origins expansion or Final battle expansion or Expansion 2 or anything else we might add, effortless

Check out the add ons below:

Grendha: Origins Expansion is the prequel of Grendha: Search for Lost Triumphs. The Origins is a wondrous story of Arnorus's fight between vicious predators of Meru and with his confederates Mirgoth, Kondu, and Genu. Grendha: Origins gives a sneak-peek into both Arnorus and Meru's past. This addon is a standalone game and an entirely co-op/solo gameplay for    1-4 players.

Grendha: the Final battle is a crusade for capturing the celestial city from the God of Chaos, the demonic power which turned Arnoru into a mad king. You will be playing this game with the four heroes from the core box. This expansion is a 1-4 player semi-cooperative adventure game where the heroes are trying to capture the celestial city by destroying the demonic force. It will also enable full co-op as well as solo play experience.  

 

Partners

 

 

Designer Credits:-
• Prince Mathew                           Mary Komaristova
• Anton Berngarn                         Josh Hawley
• DCA-tabletop                              Rahul Pillai
• Vishnu                                         Grigory Rudenko
• Taras                                            NyxX
• Narendra Keshkar

Risks and challenges

This is Doptale Interactive Incorporation's first game
column2: however, it has been in development for years with a dedicated team of industry professionals who have worked on many other games before. We have specialist engineers and supply chain managers who used to work on large international projects, so we do not foresee any problems arising for production and fulfillment that we do not have the skills in the team to overcome. We have also joined forces with some of the worlds leading authorities on game fulfillment (Eastar &amp
column3:
Quartermaster Logistics) to make sure Grendha: Search For Lost Triumphs has a smooth ride to your door.

Be aware that this is not a pre-order but IGG for a product that may see some elements of the game components, artwork, and design change between what is presented here and the finished product as we strive to improve the game to the last continuously.

Our biggest challenge would be any unforeseen events that may delay the project. To that end, we have spent significant time preparing for as many eventualities as possible, but there may always be edge cases that could lead to delays.

Grendha: SFLT is a large and complex project with many interconnected pieces and potential logistical issues involved. In addition to all of the usual challenges associated with a big board game project (miniature tooling, printing, production, international shipping, etc.), there are the additional challenges involved in writing all of the included artbooks and other content not present in many other board games.

We will apply all of the knowledge that we have gained and do our best in ensuring that this is not only a successful project but one that is a joy for our backers to participate in. We have developed a reputation as an honest, forthright, and caring company that is active in our community, and we plan to continue building upon that rapport, keeping our backers involved in every step of the process.

Will problems arise during this process? Of course. But we intend to grow, learn, adapt, and, in the end, deliver a board game that will be a truly compelling experience. Thank you for considering joining this crazy ride with us.

As per the terms stated on IGG, a full refund will be provided if the request is received within 7 days of the close of the campaign. Otherwise, such a refund will be at our exclusive discretion and will be net of handling costs, IGG commissions and credit card processing fees (15%).

If you fail to check out and pay for your order, including shipping costs, before the posted payment deadline, you may be forfeiting your products. Unclaimed games will be released after the closing date to online and retail sales since we lose money on unclaimed games due to storage fees. Refunds and/or cancellation requests will only be considered before we set the print run size for mass manufacturing with our factory in China, which takes place upon the posted payment deadline for the Pledge Manager.

<h3 style=""text-align: center

Last year I completed my first crowdfunding project. Before launching it, I had always pictured that problems would come up during the campaign and careful planning would always come to the rescue. And yeah, it was like that, but in NIGHTMARE MODE due to the pandemic.

Last year I learnt a lot about solving problems and keep going, which helped me deliver my Kickstarter pledge to the backers. This year the pandemic disruption and economic slowdown will have their effects but now I have more knowledge of all the aspects involved in a Kickstarter enterprise.
This year I already know how the manufacturing company works, how to assemble the box efficiently, how to set the pledge manager, which fulfillment hubs work best, which air &
column2: sea routes should boxes take and a ton more of details that make everything work.

column1: I don’t want to say it out loud, but this time I should be able to print faster, pack faster and fulfill faster too. Fingers crossed!

Risks & Challenges

Last year I completed my first crowdfunding project. Before launching it, I had always pictured that problems would come up during the campaign and careful planning would always come to the rescue. And yeah, it was like that, but in NIGHTMARE MODE due to the pandemic.

Last year I learnt a lot about solving problems and keep going, which helped me deliver my Kickstarter pledge to the backers. This year the pandemic disruption and economic slowdown will have their effects but now I have more knowledge of all the aspects involved in a Kickstarter enterprise.

This year I already know how the manufacturing company works, how to assemble the box efficiently, how to set the pledge manager, which fulfillment hubs work best, which air & sea routes should boxes take and a ton more of details that make everything work.
I don’t want to say it out loud, but this time I should be able to print faster, pack faster and fulfill faster too. Fingers crossed!",18.0,8,"1 Campaign
