0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
Short Summary:
My name is Steven Daniels and I am an inventor aged 54 of just about anything. No rhyme nor reason can I see to not doing anything you set your heart and mind too.
With a background in building, printing, stone masonry, design, the rubber industry even, to name a few it gives you a head full of knowledge.
As inventor of Trominoes I have played it with many people and it hasn't failed yet to amaze me how many ways it can be played.

I have also taken it to Games groups and the feedback is phenomenally positive. True gamer's loving the ways in which it can be played and the tactical ways to stop others scoring and build towards a higher score for themselves.

Its a joy to play for young or old, the first person I played it with was my mum, aged 78, she picked it up in no time at all, it took all of 5 minutes to be building a good score and beat me fair and square by the end.

By ways, I mean the angles, the moves, the shapes, the defensive plays, the offensive plays each and every game will be different to the last. Yet children can play and just match numbers to make shapes or simpy make shapes!
This game is the first of about 5 that I want to bring out of my head into the real world.
With your help I can.
By taking up the Perks as listed you will be forerunners to a world wide game.
<h3><strong>What We Need &amp

• We are raising funds for machinery to produce our sets in a range of materials with the first  sets being made in High grade Birch ply. These give a lovely feel in the hand and are in the images you see in this pitch. At this time Trominoes in this material  should not be bought for or played by anybody under the age of 14.

• The machinery we will be purchasing are British made Laser cutters to enable us to expand our range of materials to include many solid and sustainably sourced timbers as well as a few other ideas we have for the future.
• The amount of funding gives us enough to buy 2 machines which we will require to fulfill our mid term requirements as well as space to put them and run a business from.

• If we don't get as much as we feel we need then we will still move ahead with a single machine and run it from a much smaller space to start with. Moving machines and signing contracts is both expensive and time consuming so we would really like to be straight in where we want at the start. If we aren't, it certainly wont stop us, that's for sure.
• We can produce these games with existing machinery and will, but we know we need to make them quicker and in multiples. It’s going to be a big seller.
The Perks:
<ul>
• The sets you  purchase here today will be at approx 30% off our Suggested Retail Prices.
• All sets come in a handy Black, double drawstring, cotton bag, keeping each set you buy protected.
<ul>
• The  30 Playing Tile set, Plus 2 racks will have an SRP of £17.50 or $24 so if bought now is £12.50 or $17
• The 46 Playing Tile set, Plus 2 racks will have an SRP of £25 or $34 so if bought now is £18 or $24
• The 57 Playing Tile set, Plus 4 racks will have an SRP of £32 or $43 so if bought now is £23 or $31
• The 77 Playing Tile set, Plus 4 racks will have an SRP of £42 or $57 so if bought now is £30 or $40
Each purchase will be shipped within 4 -6  weeks of each paid order coming to us. Once we get a good amount of funding we can purchase a new machine and decrease our lead times accordingly.
Shipping will be at the most cost effective way to give secure and safe delivery to you.
We will ship worldwide from the U.K.
Interest already from Canada and elsewhere just based on personal Facebook posts.

column5: '>The Impact:

column1: Every individual can have lots of ideas, most of which never come to fruition due to other commitments, in time, money, family.
Your purchase here today gives breath to a truly great game and you get to be one of the first to play it!
This pitch gives us both, you and I, something for our money, something for our time and something for the family.
The true enjoyment of your purchase will be two fold in that you helped us to produce it and you added value to your own game because of that fact.

You will be true pioneers, the first to buy and own a set of Trominoes, the first to show your friends how great it is, and they will remember you for it every time they play their game or play yours with you. Perhaps you gave it as a gift to them of course?
<h3>Risks &amp
I have always looked at problems with a view that every one can be dealt with, overcome, got over, under or around.

The problem we have here is solely a lack of funding to purchase the necessary machinery and upscale our manufacturing enough. Your early purchase allows us to make it cost effective to produce in our own country from materials we like the look and feel of. Giving us complete control over our products.

The sets will also be environmentally friendly with no Formaldehyde's used in the production of the ply and only coming from sustainable sources. The bag is cotton. We see no need for a box with inserts and extras coming at a cost to you and I, let alone the Earth.
We and I say we, including you all, shall produce a game that will be around in another 800 yrs just like the original Dominoes has been.
Other Ways You Can Help:

Those that cant help us with a purchase, can you please share our pitch and talk about it on social media and everywhere they go if they really love the game and would in time like to see our other games.
Or if you would simply like to help us on our way, then a donation can be made to back us as far as you'd like.

For the first 50th and then every 150 shares we will try and find away to give a gift of a Full 77 Tile set to that 150th, 300th, 450th, 600th and on, Technical but it must be able to be done, everything is.
Please use the Indiegogo sharing tools as well as word of mouth. Anyway you can think of  to get the word out.
I thank you for reading and watching and hopefully you purchased Trominoes, a game that will stand the test of time with infinite ways to play and always giving you multiple satisfaction.
","Short Summary:
My name is Steven Daniels and I am an inventor aged 54 of just about anything. No rhyme nor reason can I see to not doing anything you set your heart and mind too.
With a background in building, printing, stone masonry, design, the rubber industry even, to name a few it gives you a head full of knowledge.
As inventor of Trominoes I have played it with many people and it hasn't failed yet to amaze me how many ways it can be played.

I have also taken it to Games groups and the feedback is phenomenally positive. True gamer's loving the ways in which it can be played and the tactical ways to stop others scoring and build towards a higher score for themselves.

Its a joy to play for young or old, the first person I played it with was my mum, aged 78, she picked it up in no time at all, it took all of 5 minutes to be building a good score and beat me fair and square by the end.

By ways, I mean the angles, the moves, the shapes, the defensive plays, the offensive plays each and every game will be different to the last. Yet children can play and just match numbers to make shapes or simpy make shapes!
This game is the first of about 5 that I want to bring out of my head into the real world.
With your help I can.
By taking up the Perks as listed you will be forerunners to a world wide game.
What We Need & What You Get:

We are raising funds for machinery to produce our sets in a range of materials with the first  sets being made in High grade Birch ply. These give a lovely feel in the hand and are in the images you see in this pitch. At this time Trominoes in this material  should not be bought for or played by anybody under the age of 14.

The machinery we will be purchasing are British made Laser cutters to enable us to expand our range of materials to include many solid and sustainably sourced timbers as well as a few other ideas we have for the future.
The amount of funding gives us enough to buy 2 machines which we will require to fulfill our mid term requirements as well as space to put them and run a business from.

If we don't get as much as we feel we need then we will still move ahead with a single machine and run it from a much smaller space to start with. Moving machines and signing contracts is both expensive and time consuming so we would really like to be straight in where we want at the start. If we aren't, it certainly wont stop us, that's for sure.
We can produce these games with existing machinery and will, but we know we need to make them quicker and in multiples. It’s going to be a big seller.
The Perks:
The sets you  purchase here today will be at approx 30% off our Suggested Retail Prices.
All sets come in a handy Black, double drawstring, cotton bag, keeping each set you buy protected.
The  30 Playing Tile set, Plus 2 racks will have an SRP of £17.50 or $24 so if bought now is £12.50 or $17
The 46 Playing Tile set, Plus 2 racks will have an SRP of £25 or $34 so if bought now is £18 or $24
The 57 Playing Tile set, Plus 4 racks will have an SRP of £32 or $43 so if bought now is £23 or $31
The 77 Playing Tile set, Plus 4 racks will have an SRP of £42 or $57 so if bought now is £30 or $40
Each purchase will be shipped within 4 -6  weeks of each paid order coming to us. Once we get a good amount of funding we can purchase a new machine and decrease our lead times accordingly.
Shipping will be at the most cost effective way to give secure and safe delivery to you.
We will ship worldwide from the U.K.
Interest already from Canada and elsewhere just based on personal Facebook posts.
The Impact:
Every individual can have lots of ideas, most of which never come to fruition due to other commitments, in time, money, family.
Your purchase here today gives breath to a truly great game and you get to be one of the first to play it!
This pitch gives us both, you and I, something for our money, something for our time and something for the family.
The true enjoyment of your purchase will be two fold in that you helped us to produce it and you added value to your own game because of that fact.

You will be true pioneers, the first to buy and own a set of Trominoes, the first to show your friends how great it is, and they will remember you for it every time they play their game or play yours with you. Perhaps you gave it as a gift to them of course?
Risks & Challenges:

The problem we have here is solely a lack of funding to purchase the necessary machinery and upscale our manufacturing enough. Your early purchase allows us to make it cost effective to produce in our own country from materials we like the look and feel of. Giving us complete control over our products.

The sets will also be environmentally friendly with no Formaldehyde's used in the production of the ply and only coming from sustainable sources. The bag is cotton. We see no need for a box with inserts and extras coming at a cost to you and I, let alone the Earth.
We and I say we, including you all, shall produce a game that will be around in another 800 yrs just like the original Dominoes has been.

I thank you for reading and watching and hopefully you purchased Trominoes, a game that will stand the test of time with infinite ways to play and always giving you multiple satisfaction.",1.0,0,"1 Campaign

Bob is a professional structure engineer, and Yoyo is an experienced designer. We are enthusiastic brick fans.

In order to make bricks have better and multi-functional performances, we try to find simpler and reusable ways to achieve our goal.

We prepared over 6 months to research this new toy, and applied for a patent. Not only do we search the best material with powerful sucking ability, but also consider its safety.

We need your contributions to help us to bring Brick Suction Cups to this world! Thanks Indiegogo for offering the great chance to fulfill our dreams!

What makes bricks accessories more attractive?

That is reusable “Brick Sucker”(Brick Suction Cups)!

Bricks float as long as there is a smooth surface that shows an incredible sighting effect.

It is super cool by its simplicity.

Searching places where you can suck: bathroom, car, or iPhone supporter?

Let’s create your imagination!

Compatible with most toy block systems like Lego Bricks, Mega Bloks, and etc… It's reusable!

Now bring the fun wherever you go!


 

If there's any further question on this, please feel free to contact us at any time. email: wy323@yahoo.com.hk  or  yoyogroup888@gmail.com .

Short but Awesome Summary

This awesome game of Bung Hole was created by a couple of Floridians who had too much time on their hands and a head full of poop jokes. Obviously, living in the sunshine state, going to the beach is an everyday thing (must be nice). All you gotta do is put the Bowls into the sand and throw our nifty and sturdy Bungs in the hole! It's like cornhole, but better, and for the beach. I mean, could you imagine carrying your cornhole set to the beach? What a weird thing to do!
<h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >BEACH CORN HOLE WITHOUT THE ANNOYING HEAVY BOARDS!

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center
<h3>What We Need &amp
We need a few things to get this moving:
<ul>

• There are freakin' fantastic perks available for helping us, starting at $5. If you spend a little bit more and not be a cheapo, you can get an actual BungHole set before Amazon and the big box stores start taking it. You'll be the coolest people on the beach.

• If we reach the goal, the funds will help us continue manufacturing and creating color variations, bigger sizes, and help feed our staff elephant that is just sitting in the middle of our office. C'MON, DON'T LEAVE THE ELEPHANT HUNGRY!
The Impact of Bung Hole
This is a novelty game for the WHOLE FAMILY. Yes, it's laced with poop jokes and humor, but it's family friendly. We are bringing families closer together with poop jokes. What could be better?
Also, this product was developed by American Inventors. Buying this game supports American households and innovation.
<h3>Risks &amp
Our main risk is selling out, and quickly! That's it! The product is here and ready to go!
Other Ways You Can Help
Spread the word about our weird game! Tell your friends about Bung Hole! Join us in our outlandish social campaigns and we will repay you (we like to give hugs).
<ul>
• Make some noise! We will give away FREE units of Bung Hole if you get crazy on our social media pages.
• SHARE using the Indiegogo sharing tools. There's lotsa ways to do it!

Bung Hole is being produced by Source Direct, a nationally recognized invention company, specializing in products across the entire industry! Your order is secure, and will get to you by the deadline.

column2: >Help us reach more people!
column3:
> 

 

This is what people say about our books so far:

 

 

Download our first two Interactive Books - The Prehistory:
column5:
gl=US"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Google Play  and  App Store

 

 

 

EXITUS is a one-of-a-kind reading experience that combines several unique things:

 

The Co-Creator option is exclusive and available only for a limited time, with each and every Pledge Level including 8 Works of Art that form the foundation on which EXITUS is constructed.

Eighth and last among these perks is the one where you become a Co-Creator and by doing so you not only get the game but you also remain forever as part of it because your name will be immortalized in the project. In this way, every Co-Creator will reach the inverted eight, which happens to be the magical symbol of Infinity.
column8: controls=1&amp
column9: showinfo=0"">

column1: <div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/_ZZPSER8Tgg?autohide=1&amp

Besides the above-listed monumental foundations on which EXITUS is built, it also has the following 10 important characteristics:

 

 

Covid-19 has made the last year terribly hard for everybody, so we’ve decided that our base package should cost just 17 EUR and within this price, we offer not the usual 1 hour “Escape the Room” game or a simple book experience, but about 10 hours of mysteries, challenges, storytelling, and fun.

And to all our future backers who are willing to choose a higher pledge level – THANK YOU!

Each of you will not only get additional special extras but will also support us and our immense effort.

 

 

Our goal is to make participation in the project as easy as possible, so the payment will be one-time and will take place here, on Indiegogo Platform. This includes also the shipping costs when ordering the „ARTE FACTA” level. 

IMPORTANT: When you pledge for the ""Arte Facta"" level, the delivery price will be automatically added at the time of the pre-order. If you get a message that your country is not eligible for delivery, write us a personal message and we will check if we will be able to add your country of residence to the list.

 

 

* (Lat.) an object that is made by a person, such as a tool or a decoration, especially one that is of historical interest.

A set of FOUR mysterious, beautiful, and purely hand-made artefacts, included in the ARTE FACTA Reward Level.

 

 

This is the accessory that served as an inspiration for the magic bracelets worn by the main characters in the saga.

It’s a bracelet with a unique design, hand-woven using a specific technique, and 414 precise needlepoint stitches. It features the Elbetitsa figure in which are coded several ancient symbols of health, wealth, and harmony.

Elbetitsa is one of the oldest images found in the solar calendars of many peoples and exists as a symbol in almost all of the main ancient religions in the world.

Apart from being an elegant accessory, the bracelet is A CLUE and unlocks an additional and self-contained chapter in the game where you can find yet one more unique puzzle.

The bracelet is unisex and comfortable to wear on the left or the right hand.

 

 

 

Both medallions bear the original design that inspired the images on the amulets that protect Marc and Zoé during their adventure. They feature two ancient runic symbols dated back to the 1st century CE and found in many different written records across the world.

The material they are made of is pieces of wild cherry wood remaining after the making of furniture and usually thrown away as waste.

Our master craftsman buys these beautiful pieces of waste wood directly from the furniture factory and turns them into hand-made works of art.

Both accessories are unisex, extremely comfortable to wear, with soft fabric necklaces.

Each of the medallions is A CLUE to an additional and self-contained chapter in the game where you can find yet one more riddle.

 

 

 

A top-secret object that will remain hidden until you receive it. What we can say now, however, is that it's created by us personally and for you to be able to solve its secret, it will require some extra courage because it could be even a little dangerous.

This item is accompanied by an additional and hidden story chapter, plus the clever hints if you need some help while solving the puzzle.

 

 

The challenges in EXITUS have been designed in such a way that they can be solved by one person or group of people.

*If you prefer to read the story at your leisure and solve the puzzles by yourself – you do that.

*If you want to share your enjoyment of the game with those close to you – your friends or family, you can do that as well.

 

 

 

EXITUS is a game that illustrates the way an epic novel transforms into an unforgettable interactive experience when it is integrated with unique riddles, mysterious physical artefacts, music, sounds, portraits, graphics, and more.

 

 

EXITUS is a lengthy pleasure which, depending on the speed of reading and of solving riddles, can even last for few days. That’s why every time you close the EXITUS App, your last position will be saved automatically and when you next open the game, you’ll continue from the point where you last left off.

 

 

Once you’ve downloaded EXITUS App on your phone or tablet, you can go on to read the story and enjoy the music, sound effects, portraits, graphics, hints, the answers to the riddles – and in general, play the whole game from the beginning to the end.

Without internet. Everywhere. No limitations.

 

 

You’ve been solving the riddles quite well
column2:
you are ahead with the story and are becoming more and more involved in its complications when suddenly … your progress is blocked by a puzzle for which you need a hint.

And while you’re frantically searching the internet for a helpful clue or waiting for another player to advise you on your next action, your initial excitement melts away and never comes back the way it was.

With EXITUS the above scenario is impossible.

If you need a hint, it’s at your disposal at any moment because all hints, together with all the answers, can be found in EXITUS App and are always just one click away.

This allows you to choose your own tempo at which to move ahead in the game, as well as to make your own decision when or whether to use a hint.

 

 

 

EXITUS doesn’t come out of nothing.

EXITUS is part of the world’s first multilingual Challenge Book Game Series and although it has been created as a fully self-contained and independent game to be played with no prior preparation, the first two parts of the series come as a free bonus accompanying it. They contain the exciting prehistory of the events making up the story of EXITUS.

In addition, concealed in each one of these two mobile gamebooks are 12 challenging riddles.

If you want to trace the whole epic story from its very beginning, then Vol. 1 – PRAELUDIUM and Vol. 2 – CODEX are available to you completely free and they challenge you.

Download our first two Interactive Book Games - The Prehistory:
column4:
gl=US"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Google Play  and  App Store

 

 

ЕXITUS will be available worldwide! If you have an email address and access to Google Play or App Store, you will surely receive and be able to play EXITUS, no matter where in the world you are.

 

 

 

IN THIS VIDEO YOU CAN MEET US AND FOLLOW OUR STORY:
column5: controls=1&amp
column6:
showinfo=0"">
 

For many months now we’ve been working hard, applying all the experience we have gained as creators and managers of two successful Escape the Room games, followed by those two unique virtual gamebooks:

 

 

This Indiegogo campaign is our PERSONAL INVITATION to all the fans of unusual, innovative, and exciting challenges.

If you’re one of those people, now is the time to join us!

Become part of EXITUS and get a game that is an exciting challenge to the mind and a unique treat to the senses.

 

 

We rely on a solid and experienced team of professionals with proven expertise in their fields and with whom we’ve already worked on our previous games. They are wonderful people, and we trust them unconditionally because with time, we’ve become more than collaborators – we’ve become friends.

The names of all those who have helped EXITUS to become a reality will be ceremoniously announced in the completed project and will remain part of it forever.

Editors, translators, programmers, graphic designers, artists, puzzle testers, sound-recording experts, etc.

 

The packaging and sending of the rewards which include the ARTE FACTA Set will be done by a team of our own and directly monitored by us.

In principle, we can send those rewards to almost any country in the world. However, in view of the current situation dictated by a global pandemic, there may be some problems in receiving the package. If you believe that the country in which you live does not have a trusted postal system, you can choose a pledge level that does not require shipping.

IMPORTANT: When you pledge for the ""Arte Facta""  level, the delivery price will be automatically added at the time of your pre-order. If you get a message that your country is not eligible for delivery, write us a personal message and we will check if we will be able to add your country of residence to the list.
column7: > Help us reach more people!
column8: text=#EXITUS:PuzzleGame.MysteryNovel.SecretCityGuide.%0AAstory-driven,multilingual,deeplyimmersiveandhighlyinteractivepuzzleexperiencewithmusic,sounds,graphics&amp
column9: othermysteries.&amp
column10:
original_referer=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2101388787/exitus-puzzle-game-mystery-novel-secret-city-guide?ref=user_menu"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We are game makers, developers, team leaders, and publishers since 2014, so we are quite familiar with the full pipeline of product creation and its delivery. We do not expect any problems in completing the final version of the game because over 90% of it has already been created. However, when it comes to a multi-layered project like ours, there are certain parts of the process we cannot control. For example, unexpected illness of a team member, delay in the manufacturing process, global pandemic situation, or some force majeure circumstance. That said, we promise that we will do absolutely everything we can to overcome any problem that arises, so we can fulfill our commitment to all our backers by delivering them the best possible version of EXITUS. 

Terms and conditions:

CHANGES TO PRODUCT:

By ordering the game, you acknowledge that the design, final look, and materials of the project are subject to change and may differ from what is presented on this page.

DAMAGED PRODUCTS:

Our game does not include easily breakable parts, and therefore we believe that all backers will receive their games intact. We promise that we will do our best to ensure that your package arrives in the best condition but if you still find a broken part in your package, we will replace it for you. However, all decisions on part replacements due to damage occurred during delivery will be made at our discretion and on a case-by-case basis.

RETURNED PRODUCTS:

If you refuse to accept and/or collect your package on arrival, we cannot issue you a refund for the cost of the pledge.

By ordering the game, you agree that our responsibility to you is for sending your order. You are responsible for import duties or other fees that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities in your country.

You also accept that you are fully liable for incorrect shipping details and will risk your order being unable to be delivered.

By pledging to this project you are indicating that you understand and give consent to the risks, challenges, and the project's terms and conditions laid out above.

If you get a message that your country is not eligible for delivery, write us a personal message and we will check if we will be able to add your country of residence to the list.  * (Lat.) an object that is made by a person, such as a tool or a decoration, especially one that is of historical interest.A set of FOUR mysterious, beautiful, and purely hand-made artefacts, included in the ARTE FACTA Reward Level.  This is the accessory that served as an inspiration for the magic bracelets worn by the main characters in the saga.It’s a bracelet with a unique design, hand-woven using a specific technique, and 414 precise needlepoint stitches. It features the Elbetitsa figure in which are coded several ancient symbols of health, wealth, and harmony.Elbetitsa is one of the oldest images found in the solar calendars of many peoples and exists as a symbol in almost all of the main ancient religions in the world.Apart from being an elegant accessory, the bracelet is A CLUE and unlocks an additional and self-contained chapter in the game where you can find yet one more unique puzzle.The bracelet is unisex and comfortable to wear on the left or the right hand.   Both medallions bear the original design that inspired the images on the amulets that protect Marc and Zoé during their adventure. They feature two ancient runic symbols dated back to the 1st century CE and found in many different written records across the world.The material they are made of is pieces of wild cherry wood remaining after the making of furniture and usually thrown away as waste.Our master craftsman buys these beautiful pieces of waste wood directly from the furniture factory and turns them into hand-made works of art.Both accessories are unisex, extremely comfortable to wear, with soft fabric necklaces.Each of the medallions is A CLUE to an additional and self-contained chapter in the game where you can find yet one more riddle.   A top-secret object that will remain hidden until you receive it. What we can say now, however, is that it's created by us personally and for you to be able to solve its secret, it will require some extra courage because it could be even a little dangerous.This item is accompanied by an additional and hidden story chapter, plus the clever hints if you need some help while solving the puzzle.  The challenges in EXITUS have been designed in such a way that they can be solved by one person or group of people.*If you prefer to read the story at your leisure and solve the puzzles by yourself – you do that.*If you want to share your enjoyment of the game with those close to you – your friends or family, you can do that as well.   EXITUS is a game that illustrates the way an epic novel transforms into an unforgettable interactive experience when it is integrated with unique riddles, mysterious physical artefacts, music, sounds, portraits, graphics, and more.  EXITUS is a lengthy pleasure which, depending on the speed of reading and of solving riddles, can even last for few days. That’s why every time you close the EXITUS App, your last position will be saved automatically and when you next open the game, you’ll continue from the point where you last left off.  Once you’ve downloaded EXITUS App on your phone or tablet, you can go on to read the story and enjoy the music, sound effects, portraits, graphics, hints, the answers to the riddles – and in general, play the whole game from the beginning to the end.Without internet. Everywhere. No limitations.  You’ve been solving the riddles quite well
column2: you are ahead with the story and are becoming more and more involved in its complications when suddenly … your progress is blocked by a puzzle for which you need a hint.And while you’re frantically searching the internet for a helpful clue or waiting for another player to advise you on your next action, your initial excitement melts away and never comes back the way it was.With EXITUS the above scenario is impossible.If you need a hint, it’s at your disposal at any moment because all hints, together with all the answers, can be found in EXITUS App and are always just one click away.This allows you to choose your own tempo at which to move ahead in the game, as well as to make your own decision when or whether to use a hint.   EXITUS doesn’t come out of nothing.EXITUS is part of the world’s first multilingual Challenge Book Game Series and although it has been created as a fully self-contained and independent game to be played with no prior preparation, the first two parts of the series come as a free bonus accompanying it. They contain the exciting prehistory of the events making up the story of EXITUS.In addition, concealed in each one of these two mobile gamebooks are 12 challenging riddles.If you want to trace the whole epic story from its very beginning, then Vol. 1 – PRAELUDIUM and Vol. 2 – CODEX are available to you completely free and they challenge you.Download our first two Interactive Book Games - The Prehistory:Google Play  and  App Store  ЕXITUS will be available worldwide! If you have an email address and access to Google Play or App Store, you will surely receive and be able to play EXITUS, no matter where in the world you are.   IN THIS VIDEO YOU CAN MEET US AND FOLLOW OUR STORY:  For many months now we’ve been working hard, applying all the experience we have gained as creators and managers of two successful Escape the Room games, followed by those two unique virtual gamebooks:  This Indiegogo campaign is our PERSONAL INVITATION to all the fans of unusual, innovative, and exciting challenges.If you’re one of those people, now is the time to join us!Become part of EXITUS and get a game that is an exciting challenge to the mind and a unique treat to the senses.  We rely on a solid and experienced team of professionals with proven expertise in their fields and with whom we’ve already worked on our previous games. They are wonderful people, and we trust them unconditionally because with time, we’ve become more than collaborators – we’ve become friends.The names of all those who have helped EXITUS to become a reality will be ceremoniously announced in the completed project and will remain part of it forever.Editors, translators, programmers, graphic designers, artists, puzzle testers, sound-recording experts, etc. The packaging and sending of the rewards which include the ARTE FACTA Set will be done by a team of our own and directly monitored by us.In principle, we can send those rewards to almost any country in the world. However, in view of the current situation dictated by a global pandemic, there may be some problems in receiving the package. If you believe that the country in which you live does not have a trusted postal system, you can choose a pledge level that does not require shipping.IMPORTANT: When you pledge for the ""Arte Facta""  level, the delivery price will be automatically added at the time of your pre-order. If you get a message that your country is not eligible for delivery, write us a personal message and we will check if we will be able to add your country of residence to the list.   Help us reach more people!    Risks and challengesWe are game makers, developers, team leaders, and publishers since 2014, so we are quite familiar with the full pipeline of product creation and its delivery. We do not expect any problems in completing the final version of the game because over 90% of it has already been created. However, when it comes to a multi-layered project like ours, there are certain parts of the process we cannot control. For example, unexpected illness of a team member, delay in the manufacturing process, global pandemic situation, or some force majeure circumstance. That said, we promise that we will do absolutely everything we can to overcome any problem that arises, so we can fulfill our commitment to all our backers by delivering them the best possible version of EXITUS. Terms and conditions:CHANGES TO PRODUCT:By ordering the game, you acknowledge that the design, final look, and materials of the project are subject to change and may differ from what is presented on this page.DAMAGED PRODUCTS:Our game does not include easily breakable parts, and therefore we believe that all backers will receive their games intact. We promise that we will do our best to ensure that your package arrives in the best condition but if you still find a broken part in your package, we will replace it for you. However, all decisions on part replacements due to damage occurred during delivery will be made at our discretion and on a case-by-case basis.RETURNED PRODUCTS:If you refuse to accept and/or collect your package on arrival, we cannot issue you a refund for the cost of the pledge.By ordering the game, you agree that our responsibility to you is for sending your order. You are responsible for import duties or other fees that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities in your country.You also accept that you are fully liable for incorrect shipping details and will risk your order being unable to be delivered.By pledging to this project you are indicating that you understand and give consent to the risks, challenges, and the project's terms and conditions laid out above.",63.0,4,"1 Campaign

column1: |","Luzern, Switzerland",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/exitus-mystery-story-puzzle-game-city-guide/pica

0,"

Good day to you
column2:
My name is Seth T. Niccum. I am the C.E.O. of Tokumei LLC. Based here in Indianapolis Indiana. We specialize in Media and game entertainment production. Each member of our core production and development team, has a deep background in media production, marketing, game development, law, and computer securities. Because of this rather diverse team of professionals, it grants us the unique ability to create new concepts in media entertainment, and game design, while also understanding how to shore up our cost potentials and limit the production overhead a great deal more than most of our Independent competitors.

The core scope of this campaign was originally to generate enough market interest in the form of pre-sale revenue, from you the viewer. This way we can facilitate the mass market production of our popular Social intrigue and corporate scandal game
column3:
“Monkey Wrench deluxe edition”. However, what we discovered that as we got closer to releasing this innovative social game, that we kept finding more and more things to add to it, that just simply made sense. Thus kept changing and tweaking everything until we refined the original game into something so much more profound, and much more captivating, that we had to sell this game as something better.

I present unto you
column4:
""Monkey Wrench"" - Second edition. Now, our plan is to still mass produce this title at a much higher volume, than before. But this time we decided to go through a different manufacturer, than before. Currently, our first edition copy was initially released back in April of 2017, through the Print on Demand website, ""The Game Crafter"" (Link Below). While is a great site for new innovative printing concepts in gaming and entertainment. Simply cannot handle the larger sales volumes that we have seen in many of our competitors. To be competitive, we need to be able to work with a company that can handle any volume, that you, our customers desire. Which is something, our current manufacturer, simply can not sustain.

Thus, while this game has been viewed as being a great concept in social gaming, that has received nothing short of a highly welcomed, change in the normal standards for “Social interaction” games. Our current source for mass production, simply cannot compete with many of our larger competitors and puts us, a new innovative game, at a serious disadvantage against any of our competitors. Especially since we are a first ever game, that additionally also has the ability to be played both in a casual setting and within something more professional. Being the first ever game of its kind puts us in a delicate position
column5:
in that this game can be played within any environment, and needs to be able to handle higher volumes of production, sustained by many of our current competitors. Especially and intentionally, since this game can also be marketed, and played within the standard workplace setting, such as being used as a “Team building”, “Icebreaking”, or “Social Experimentation” exercise, as well as just a game of casual role play.

In fact, we intentionally designed and developed this simple social interaction game to be used for exactly this purpose. To be used at your next Team building exercise. Now instead of closing your eyes and falling into the hands of others, and ""Trusting"" them to catch you when you fall, you now can sit in a circle, and socially pretend to be different roles within your very company or job. Building lasting role dynamic relationships, where you and your co-workers must work together as a team in a simulated setting.

Which means that this game, because of the way it's designed, allows players to enact different workplace “themed” social roles. ""Pretending"" to be different title roles within a fictitious company. Empowering each person with simple abilities, and duties akin to what a person in those positions of power would hold. We then shake things up a bit, a create multiple challenges, for the group to handle. Producing different ""Secret"" teams, that operate outside the simulated company, with their own agenda's, roles, and ideas. teaching players to work together in strict confidence while attempting to individually deduce, which fellow players are the positive roles in the workplace environment, and which fellow players are the damaging “Social scandals” of the workplace environment. Which many of us have often encountered.

By playing a simple social game in which our individual “Employment titles” and “Job roles” are replaced with situational “Professional titles” and “Occupational roles”, it allows each person playing the game to embrace and enact the sensation of being different people within an office setting. It also gives them the mindset, lifestyle, and their own individual responsibilities within the corporate environment. Providing a much richer overall professional experience for each individual, that garners them a broader perspective of the lifestyles and role dynamics that each of their fellow employee's experiences within their own workplace dynamic.

However, despite this innovative concept in social gaming, our games current retail price is through our current manufacturer, is simply just too high to be competitive. Standing at a staggering online, per unit POD price of $54.99 USD
column6: our profit margin as the developers of this product is only a mere $3.50. The base production price alone outside of any potential sales or resales of this product is double the retail sales price of our competitors. Meaning that to sell this game at a retail store using the laws of doubles, means I'd have to sell this game for an upwards of $120! Imagine that.. walking into your favorite game store and seeing a card game on the shelf selling for $120, sitting next to ""Cards against humanity"", that's selling for $30. Which product are you likely to buy? Even the extremely rare, and highly sought after original late 80's CCG game ""Xenophile"", is only 90$ a copy. That game had a print run of only 10k units. It's staggering.  Simply put
column7:
the Print on demand market, while convenient, has a staggering individual unit production overhead that's also keeping our popular product off of the public retail shelves. Meaning simply, our game cannot be seen by persons like yourself, who find these types of games fun and innovating.

What we need from you today, is your generous contribution towards our $30,000 target production goal. That initial revenue will be immediately sent to our now established manufacturing partner, “Panda” publishing (Link below). Who are also the same professional manufacturer and Developer of such popular hits as “Dead of Winter”, “Scythe” “pandemic”, and yes even our market competitor, “Ultimate Werewolf”. Our target seed goal will cover the $14,870, initial printing and production expense of producing an initial production run of 2500 units. The remaining balance of that $30,000, will be directed towards covering the shipping and handling cost of the final product. Which will be distributed from the manufacturers holding warehouse, based in Sunny, Los Angeles California, to each of our distribution warehouses, located in here Indiana, and Arizona. Which means that the remaining balance of that $30,000$ goal (Roughly $4,000), will help us facilitate the warehousing cost's of all the final units until we can get them delivered to persons such as yourself and our other retail small business that we are in the process of establishing shipping relations with.

This will further help us as a company no longer be limited to only being able to sell to you, our highly entertaining product online, at an exaggerated price. It will further grant us the ability the change the staggering online only price of $54.99 per unit to a far more reasonable retail price of $29.99. Additionally, we will be able to re-distribute this fantastic title into all of your favorite retail game store locations, establishing this highly entertaining social game, openly available across the country, and even semi- internationally. Imagine your next social gathering, where you and all your friends and colleagues try to figure out which person in the room is the elusive “Monkey Wrench”, the team of corporate saboteurs, who are trying to win the game through social manipulation and socio-political influence. We think you too will be highly entertained by this game as much as we were creating it, testing it, and making it available to you, today. Please help us make this game just as popular as “Werewolf” and “Card against Humanity”.

Thank You
column8:
Seth T. Niccum
CEO – Tokumei LLC.
 

Unable to fund this project? here are other ways You Can Help:

column1: • Help us spread the word on this new fun and innovative social game!
• Do you want to play this game at your job's next “Team building exercise”? Contact your companies Human Resources department, or simply tell your Boss about how cool this game is!

• Download our free copy of the games rule book located at the link below so that you can see first hand this game and all of its fun and versatility. Then go out and promote this game to your local retailer and let them know about our campaign.

• Got a favorite local game store that you'd prefer to support by purchasing new and exciting games from? Tell them about this game and have them pledge their support towards having this game mass produced and available for retail sales in their store. We're always looking for new retail partners to establish product distribution relationships with.
• Own a retail store? Contact us directly and find out about our special market ""retail"" perks incentives, that also available through this campaign.
• Make use of the Indiegogo share links provided, and help us socially market this game today!

• Let the world know how much you'd like to see this game in your local store, party, or job. The more feedback we get on this campaign, the more people will see it, and thus help us generate ""Buzzwords"", and become the next social media topic!

• Don't let those elusive “Monkey Wrench's” win within your company! Why not train today using our popular game and help your company fight against those dangerous insurgents! Only you and your diligence as a loyal employee can stop them!
<li>While Monkey Wrench is technically intended for everyone 16 years and up
column2:
The game can also be customized to account for a younger audience if needs be made, by simply excluding 6 “Adult” themed cards from the main game. Meaning you could easily play this at your next party, social outing, or Family gathering!

So download that rule book today and help support this fantastic product!

column1: • Contact us for more information about how you can gain access to our special edition hidden rewards packaged for persons who own a Business or Game store and would like to support this campaign. We offer many other options than what is listed here, and are always willing to establish business to business relations with any company, or individual, who wishes to purchase larger quantities of our hot new product. If you are interested in getting involved in our promotional packages that are exclusively for businesses don't hesitate! Contact us today!!!

External links:
Monkey Wrench 2nd Edition Website:
https://www.monkey-wrench-game.com/

Monkey Wrench Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/monkey.wrench.cardgame/

Monkey Wrench Youtube playlist!
https://youtu.be/EPi_pLBq8bE

Monkey Wrench first edition deluxe copy:
https://www.thegamecrafter.com/games/monkey-wre...

Panda Publishing and manufacturing:
http://pandagm.com/projects/

0,"

MASTERS of MAYHEM!

Masters of Mayhem is a disaster-based population control game! Your goal is to completely decimate every other player's populations using a variety of natural and unnatural disasters! As you're destroying each other, the map is also growing every round!

As you play the game, you discover new and strange ways to eliminate your opponents and expand your territory! Use geomagnetic storms to kill opponents trying to escape! Crack the map in half with a massive earthquake! Or if it comes to it, just nuke everyone!

I've been working on this game for about a year now, and it's finally time to get it produced! I've put in my blood, sweat and tears, but I can't do this alone! I need you to help me get it into your hands!

I've already successfully funded the game on kickstarter, so I'm launching here on Indiegogo for those who might've missed the game the first time around!

The idea for the game started when I was staying in a hotel with my dad and our friend. We started talking about board games my dad and I had been developing, and I brought up an idea I had. We started brainstorming and a tangible idea started to form: A game where everyone teams up to stop overpopulation! It felt like a brilliant idea! When I finally got home a threw together a prototype as fast as possible. I cut the paper, got little backgammon pieces, and my brother and started to play the game. We quickly realized this game was extremely boring. That sucked. But suddenly, an idea popped into my head: What if we fought each other instead of the abstract people? Implementing this idea made the game extremely fun to play! And thus, Masters of Mayhem was born!

I'm the type of person who can get bored of a game really easily, but I have no problem with Masters of Mayhem! I've played it at least 30 times, and every time was just as fun as the last, if not more!

Because of the mix of chaos and strategy, every time you play it is different! Because of the mix of tiles and cards, the possibilities for each game are almost infinite!

We've tested this game numerous times and have sent it through the refinery multiple times. What we got was the current version of the game!

 

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

I need to sell 100 board games to make this dream possible, hence the goal of $5000. Reaching that goal and anything over that would be AMAZING! 

You can choose to just support us by donating any amount! Even if you don't want the game, but want to support us, anything helps!

$60 - This amount gets you the awesome Masters of Mayhem board game!

With the game you get:

39 Hexagonal Tiles 

120 Meeples of 6 different colors

75 Destruction cards 

42 tokens 

 FUN! <
column3:
- (And lots of it!)

Is Masters of Mayhem for you?

We've come up with a short list of bullet points that may help you decide if you're the kind of gamer who would enjoy Masters of Mayhem:

Do your friends and family need a fun, exciting, and hilarious game that doesn't take all night to play?

Do you want to be a founding supporter of a new gaming company?

Do you have sixty bucks?

Then this is the game for you!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Tell your friends about Masters of Mayhem! 

If you don't have any friends, then you can always share this Kickstarter out to your friends on social media!

This is the first of hopefully many board and card games my brothers, my father, and I have been developing over the past few years. With the success of Masters of Mayhem, we hope to begin a long relationship with gaming fans like you for years, decades even, of fun and profit. 

And that's all there is to it.

 

Follow us:

 Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/millerbrosgames/

 Reddit:

https://www.reddit.com/r/MBGames/

 Instagram:

https://www.instagram.com/millerbrosgames/

Get the word out by using out hashtag: #MASTERSofMAYHEM

 

CONTACT US AT: millerbrosgames@gmail.com

Risks and challenges

It's easy to plan thing out ahead of time. But usually, things don't go according to plan. The biggest potential risk is timing and getting it to you ASAP. With many different parts coming from different places, there is worry that some could be lost in shipping. Also, we're hoping to get it to you before Christmas, so shipping is definitely something that we want to go smoothly!

","MASTERS of MAYHEM!Masters of Mayhem is a disaster-based population control game! Your goal is to completely decimate every other player's populations using a variety of natural and unnatural disasters! As you're destroying each other, the map is also growing every round!As you play the game, you discover new and strange ways to eliminate your opponents and expand your territory! Use geomagnetic storms to kill opponents trying to escape! Crack the map in half with a massive earthquake! Or if it comes to it, just nuke everyone!I've been working on this game for about a year now, and it's finally time to get it produced! I've put in my blood, sweat and tears, but I can't do this alone! I need you to help me get it into your hands!I've already successfully funded the game on kickstarter, so I'm launching here on Indiegogo for those who might've missed the game the first time around!The idea for the game started when I was staying in a hotel with my dad and our friend. We started talking about board games my dad and I had been developing, and I brought up an idea I had. We started brainstorming and a tangible idea started to form: A game where everyone teams up to stop overpopulation! It felt like a brilliant idea! When I finally got home a threw together a prototype as fast as possible. I cut the paper, got little backgammon pieces, and my brother and started to play the game. We quickly realized this game was extremely boring. That sucked. But suddenly, an idea popped into my head: What if we fought each other instead of the abstract people? Implementing this idea made the game extremely fun to play! And thus, Masters of Mayhem was born!I'm the type of person who can get bored of a game really easily, but I have no problem with Masters of Mayhem! I've played it at least 30 times, and every time was just as fun as the last, if not more!Because of the mix of chaos and strategy, every time you play it is different! Because of the mix of tiles and cards, the possibilities for each game are almost infinite!We've tested this game numerous times and have sent it through the refinery multiple times. What we got was the current version of the game! What We Need & What You GetI need to sell 100 board games to make this dream possible, hence the goal of $5000. Reaching that goal and anything over that would be AMAZING! You can choose to just support us by donating any amount! Even if you don't want the game, but want to support us, anything helps!$60 - This amount gets you the awesome Masters of Mayhem board game!With the game you get:39 Hexagonal Tiles 120 Meeples of 6 different colors75 Destruction cards 42 tokens  FUN! <- (And lots of it!)Is Masters of Mayhem for you?We've come up with a short list of bullet points that may help you decide if you're the kind of gamer who would enjoy Masters of Mayhem:Do your friends and family need a fun, exciting, and hilarious game that doesn't take all night to play?Do you want to be a founding supporter of a new gaming company?Do you have sixty bucks?Then this is the game for you!Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Tell your friends about Masters of Mayhem! If you don't have any friends, then you can always share this Kickstarter out to your friends on social media!This is the first of hopefully many board and card games my brothers, my father, and I have been developing over the past few years. With the success of Masters of Mayhem, we hope to begin a long relationship with gaming fans like you for years, decades even, of fun and profit. And that's all there is to it. Follow us: Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/millerbrosgames/ Reddit:https://www.reddit.com/r/MBGames/ Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/millerbrosgames/Get the word out by using out hashtag: #MASTERSofMAYHEM CONTACT US AT: millerbrosgames@gmail.comRisks and challengesIt's easy to plan thing out ahead of time. But usually, things don't go according to plan. The biggest potential risk is timing and getting it to you ASAP. With many different parts coming from different places, there is worry that some could be lost in shipping. Also, we're hoping to get it to you before Christmas, so shipping is definitely something that we want to go smoothly!",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hi, does any of the following descriptions fit you?
• Tired of push-fitting and breaking down building blocks so much that your fingertip turns red.
• You have a 3D printer and want to print something that your kids can toy with.
• Just need to have a small toy on your desk to mess with to kill boredom.
Or
• Want to print a set of wargaming terrain that you can break down and change.
•

If so, then good news! I’m sure you’ll like the kits I designed.​

 

Right now you might be wondering:

“How do you make all the parts connect and break down so easily?”
column3:
> 

 

Basically the kit uses magnets to create enough binding force to connect the parts.  And a very simple structure built inside the parts prevents the magnet repelling each other.

 

 

Printable content
column5: ><font style=""vertical-align: inherit

column1:
Basic kit

 

 

Pipe support kit

 

Expansion kit

(Each kit is delivered as an STL digital file pack to print on your home 3d printer.)

 

 

Back my project and receive files to print these pipes on your own.

 

if you have any questions about C Pipe, you can ask here.

 

Assembling the kit

You might also be wondering if the kit will be difficult to assemble.

So let’s take a look at the simple assembling method.
column3:
showinfo=0"">
 
 

All the parts can be put together by latch mechanism.

column1:
The size of the neodymium magnets are D8*2mm .

 

(Due to the different levels of precision of each printer, we have put in five files for caps of different tightness, so you can choose the best one for you. If you still feel the cap is too loose for your liking, you can also use glue to seal the cap.)
Specifications
After assambleing, all of the pieces are no bigger than a 36*36*36mm cube.
(some special parts may have a different length compared to other parts.)

Let’s see how these pipes can be put together!

Here are some examples:

Break down quickly

column3:
>Risks and challenges

No risk, all reward. Almost every model is test printed and ready for delivery. I will continue printing and testing during the campaign. Stretch goal models will delivered in the order they are completed.

 

Warning

For parents of preschool children

This toy could cause choking hazard.

Therefore not suitable for children under 5 years of age.

 

 

3d printing parameter reference

Print Settings:

Nozzle Diameter: 0.4 mm

Primary Layer Height: 0.2 mm

Top/Bottom Solid: 4 

Outline/Perimeter Shells: 2

Infill Percentage: 10%

Outline Direction: Inside->
column4:
Out

Supports: Yes

Max Overhang Angle: 60 deg

Heated Bed: Yes
