<h2 style=""text-align: center
<h2 style=""text-align: center
Enigma Crime Scene: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/enigma-crime...

We reached the funding goal in under 3 days!! Thank you guys!!

The Enigma Box: The biggest adventure of all time, from your front room. 

We want to offer you a challenge and an experience based on historical events, full of enigmas and mysteries that will test your wits. This challenge is for adventurers, gamers, mystery seekers, puzzle-solvers and the curious minded who want to immerse themselves in the biggest collection of enigmas ever. Using the most advanced technology you will travel to incredible locations around the world without leaving your front room.
column2:
>

You can either play on your own, supported by your friends or with anyone you consider fit to face the challenge. We guarantee that this experience will not leave you unsatisfied
column3: it is designed and supported by world class experts in the fields of technology, history and entertainment.
column4:
>

 ● The Ultimate experience, from your front room. An adventure across time and into far off lands. Placing the most advanced technology and analyses of thousands of years worth of riddles into the palm of your hands.  It's time to try new things!

● More than 6000 minutes of challenging enigmas and interactive adventures. The goal is to decipher the mystery of 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the Secret of Secrets, the unique item that will change the destiny of humankind.
column5:
>

● You will use latest generation technology: virtual reality, augmented reality, graphene, 3D printing, NFC chips and more.

● All those who complete the game, regardless of how long it takes them and what methods are used, will gain access to an epic VR finale and a special international event (streaming &
column6: physical location, gifts, surprises, etc).
column7:
>

● “The Enigma Box” ® is just the beginning, we will launch new challenges which will arrive in your email and which you can download for free to use with your box. Some of the new extensions are available now. 

● This challenge will boost your dexterity and intuition
column8: it will increase your understanding of the world and next-level thinking
column9: enhance your knowledge  and your skills
column10: expand your contacts and, most of all,  you’ll have a great time!
column11:
>

● It is a game for people of all ages, genders, and backgrounds. You do not have to have pre-existing skills or knowledge to fully enjoy the adventure.

● You can play Enigma Box as a Team Building actividad / game for companies.

We are working with Backerkit

column1: Will history know your name?
column2:
>

The places, explorations and investigations in this challenge are based on real events, which will guarantee the greatest adventure of a lifetime.  

Chance, technology and intuition guided us to find hidden messages which gave us the coordinates of a late XIXth century box buried in the French Pyrenees. What we found forms part of an unprecedented discovery, as it allowed us to access knowledge, data and cryptograms belonging to a secret society. These cryptograms contain a revelation which may change how we understand the world.
column3:
>

With all the research, enigmas, and new revelations, the team from “The Rhomb” have designed an international challenge and a new form of entertainment which will change the way games are made, revolutionizing and creating a definitive experience never seen before and giving you a chance to discover the ""Arcanum Arcanorum"", the Secret of Secrets
column4:
>

We invite you to discover an odyssey in a world full of plots and enigmas. An intense experience which will take you to a multitude of incredible places around the world, without even leaving your front room! 

Your goal is to discover the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the Secret of Secrets.
column5:
>

We do not want to unveil all the secrets and mysteries that the box hides, as it contains compartments, secret riddles and games, which you will have to discover on your own as you progress through the adventure, but we understand and think it is fair, that you should know what is included in it and what you are buying when you join this adventure. In detail and with pictures:

column1: • Welcome pack: Booklet, Card and letter for The Rhomb society​
• ​Enigma Box with compartments, codes, tools and secrets
• The experience and adventure of a lifetime
• ​Secret Code T-Shirt and “The Rhomb” Pin
• More than 60 riddles and puzzles
• Mobile (Android and iOS) App Content
• 30 Investigation and historical documents
• Metaphysical and alchemical figures
• Augmented and Virtual Reality objects
• Eight 360-degree space access
• Virtual Reality glasses
• Board Game Map with exclusive physical and virtual contents
• Work tools: UV ink pens, compass, extendable pen with magnet, etc
• Graphene key with NFC chip​
• ​150 Enigma cards

● The Box: The box itself holds all elements of “The Enigma Box” ® challenge you will need in the game. It also hides secrets and components which you need to discover and which support other enigmas. It contains the necessary tools that will help you at all times and that will guide you when lost. It will shed light on how to progress.
column2:
>

●  Welcome pack (Card and letter for The Rhomb society): The first thing you see will be the welcome letter. A numbered card which gives you immediate access to “The Rhomb” ® society and its discoveries and secrets reserved exclusively for members. We will provide you with codes to access the site and app so that you can begin to unlock 3D scenes and virtual objects with your phone (iOS or Android).
column3:
>

● Booklet: The Arcanum book is a key element. Here you will find instructions on how to advance in the game, hints, images, exclusive information and everything else you will need in order to complete the adventure.
column4:
>

● More than 60 riddles and puzzles: The box contains over 60 riddles hidden in its compartments, including the Kit Card, Substitution Enigma, 3D puzzles, Scylates Cylinder, Chinese Shadows, and many more you have never seen. You will need to discover and resolve these either on your own or with your team.
column5:
>

● 30 Investigation and historical documents: You will find clues such as X-rays, passports, paintings and photos. Each one of these elements forms part of one or multiple riddle. You must use your ingenuity to see how and where they combine, when to use them, and how they help you progress to the end.
column6:
>

● Virtual Reality glasses: One of the important elements of the game is the opportunity to 'travel' to real places around the world. Thanks to VR glasses and the app on your mobile (iOS or Android), you will be able to unlock scenes using coordinates and key codes. Each unlocked set of coordinates will allow you to access a specific place where you can investigate different scenarios. When using your goggles you will be transported there with 360 degree vision, being able to look all around you, seeking clues and riddles to move the adventure forward. This is the first time ever that anyone has used this technology to create a 100% real and virtual game to progress in a unique adventure. It is a never seen before experience!
column7:
>

● Board Game Map with exclusive physical and virtual contents: All great journeys and amazing tabletop games need a map and a table. In this case we have created a special map where you will find riddles and clues, see 3D elements through your mobile app, and locate physical figures with which you will build or depict diagrams. This is your base of operations, which will help you to move around the world trying to find the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the final secret hidden beneath the history, alchemy and astrology.
column8:
>


● Secret Code T-Shirt and “The Rhomb” Pin: Belonging to “The Rhomb” ® society also means wearing the distinctive emblem. The pin will help you stand out and allow you to recognize other members involved in the hunt with whom you can share experiences and knowledge. The T-shirt is not just an emblem, it also hides diagrams, secrets, and riddles. It includes a virtual image which you will only be able to unlock by viewing it with your augmented reality app.
column9:
>

● Tool Box with compartments, codes, tools and secrets: From time to time you will need tools to help you progress through challenges, so we have supplied you with some useful items: an extender with tools including a magnet, a LED light, a ruler and a balance.
column10:
>

 ● Metaphysical and Alchemical figures: We have prepared a series of figures which will assist you with the challenges, some of them are alchemic figures with symbols you must align, others have historical references, but they all have a purpose that you must discover in the game.
column11:
>


● Enigma Cards: You will find different cards with challenges, characters, symbols that you must use when you find yourself stuck or want to learn more about the story.  Including QR codes  with secret content.
column12:
>

 

● Graphene key with NFC chip:  We are pioneering the use of graphene, named “God's material” due to its incredible abilities and often considered the most powerful material in nature, possessing the greatest electric and thermal conductivity ever known.  The key is coated with graphene.
column13:
>

● Eight places/scenes accessible via 360-degree Virtual Reality glasses: You will also be able to unlock new areas and access new 360º scenes. To do so you must insert the coordinates and key words.
column14:
>

The App     

The box is an entry point into a realm that will allow you to travel to remote places and access confidential and exclusive information. To enable all these functions we have designed an app you can download on your phone (iOS or Android) or access via your computer.
column15:
>

The app will have greater functionality depending on the amount of money raised by the campaign meaning we start with basic features: coordinates, 360 VR spaces, and access to augmented reality. Later on we can include: a central hub, progress tracking in the game, global leaderboards, a world map displaying unlocked coordinates, a library of classified content, and more.
column16:
>

Finally, you will form part of a prestigious society, “The Rhomb” ®. Members can share, collaborate, and access exclusive knowledge. As a member of the club you will be able to attend exclusive events.  

Will you take part in this great revolution and help us to make this a reality?

At the end of the campaign we will offer some extra items: t-shirts, extensions, pins, etc.
column17:
>

For those looking for even greater prestige and fame, and to deepen their knowledge with exclusive information, we have designed the “Enigma Box Deluxe”. This is a limited version: no more than 1033 units will be available!
column18:
>

The “Enigma Box Deluxe” contains the same elements as the original box plus the following additions:

column1: Included:
<ul>
• An NFC ring to unlock information
• Additional riddles and exclusive ‘The Rhomb’ documents
• Previously unseen 360 scenes via mobile app
• Unpublished images and photographs from the discovery and opening
• VIP membership to The Rhomb Secret Society
• Exclusive access to experiences, demos and events
• Access to discoveries far sooner than anyone else
• A secret item

● Welcome Pack:  

      - Welcome VIP card and VIP membership card: Exclusive access to experiences, demos and events.
      - VIP membership certificate: Access to discoveries far sooner than anyone else.
column2:
>

● Exclusive Tech Accessories:  

    - NFC ring to contactless unlock content.  
    - Bracelet with hidden USB loaded with exclusive information
    - Wallet with card tools
column3:
>

● Advanced Riddles:  

    - Magnifying glasses with lights
    - Box with a secret lock and its surprising content 
    - Exclusive alchemy riddle
    - Labyrinth with advanced content
    - “Cube Circuit” riddle
    - A ""3 phase circular"" cryptogram
column4:
>

 ● Documents: Unpublished images and photographs from the discovery of the box  and its opening.
column5:
>
  •  Previously unseen 360° VR scenes: With new clues and content.
column7:
>

The objective is to find the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the Secret of Secrets, hidden in a specific place in the world and kept there by powerful groups and secret societies.  

To do this you have “The Enigma Box”, which contains the documents, maps, riddles, and materials you will need to find this secret. You will also need to apply your ingenuity and investigative skills to advance in this adventure, either on your own or with companions who may join you in your quest. You will also make use of the most advanced technology in the fields of virtual reality and augmented reality, objects designed with graphene, and content stored in NFC chips.
column8:
>

We are offering you a type of a game never seen before, a radical change in the way you experience a unique adventure from home. You can either play on your own, supported by your friends or with anyone you consider fit to face the challenge. We have combined an incredible story based on real events, comprising a gripping atmosphere, the most astonishing riddles, the most advanced technology, and the possibility to become a part of history.

Of course you will be able to make safer progress and enjoy your experience more if you are accompanied in this journey by friends, as together you can support each other when you are stuck, exchange different perspectives, and discover clues that you may have missed.
column9:
>

We have prepared a grand finale which will give you exclusive access to new information and new experiences. Only the chosen ones can reach the end and access the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the Secret of Secrets. Will you be one of them?  

To reach the end you must face the greatest Multiple Enigma of all time, decrypt riddles, solve cryptograms, and test yourself. Each of these challenges will allow you to unlock coordinates to different places in the world, all accessible through your VR glasses. 

You will really believe you are there, thanks to the incredible technology and VR glasses, allowing you to access subterranean crypts in medieval castles, empty beaches surrounded by dangerous jungles, or the bustling, mysterious streets of Marrakesh. All without leaving your house. You will feel like one of the greatest adventurers of all time, travelling the world hunting for clues.
column10:
>

You really will enjoy our experience, with each new destination providing access to a virtual place, where you will find clues and riddles. This is just the beginning, as the box and its mysteries will continue to support your progress, allowing you to find the next coordinates you will need to find the next place to visit.

Website references

column1: <li>
<b>PC &amp
column2: Tech Authority - (Australia): http://bit.ly/2zyNleK

column1: <li>
""The Dice Bear"": http://thedicebear.com/2017/11/07/the-bears-pick-of-kickstarter-tabletop-games-oct-31-to-nov-6/
<li>
""Dice Tower"": http://www.dicetowernews.com/discover-real-secrets-with-the-enigma-box-now-on-kickstarter/47758
• ""Table Top Gaming News"": http://www.tabletopgamingnews.com/the-enigma-box-game-up-on-kickstarter/

column2:
>

The box together with the riddles contained in it and the virtual worlds you can access (using your computer or smartphone) will all allow you to find coordinates and key words which will help you progress in the adventure. The booklet in the box will guide you through each location in the world so you know exactly what it is you need to be looking for and which enigmas may be part of it. Not everything is important. You need to find the exact combinations of objects, riddles and information to make progress.
column3:
>

Once you have all the numbers for a coordinate, you must enter them in the app or via your computer. This will unlock a new spot in the world which you must investigate through virtual reality, counting on new content made available via augmented reality.
column4:
>

Your new objective is to find the place in the world which will unlock the next clue, using the 360º VR contents and the riddles in the box. You must progress through the most mystical and mysterious places on the planet until you find your final goal and discover just what the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', or the Secret of Secrets, really is.

Some riddles in action:
column5: >
column8: >
column9:
>

What languages are available for The Enigma Box? You will find the instructions, Booklet, welcome pack in English, Spanish and French. Everything that is necessary to follow the challenge. The game is very visual and you don’t need to use the language a lot, but some riddles and puzzles will have a few words in English (only).   

The grand epic finale

Enigma Box challenge's final goal is Arcanum, which can be achieved by solving many puzzles, riddles and enigmas. All those who complete the game by the closing date (May 31, 2019), regardless of how long it takes them and what methods are used, will gain access to an epic VR finale and a special event (streaming &
column10:
physical location).

Are you going to miss out on all that?
column11:
>

We want to thank our backers for their support when we reach specific goals, so we will establish a system of unlocking new challenges, pieces, riddles, and 360º virtual spaces. This will enhance the experience and add a new dynamic to the game. 

The reward scheme is as follows:
column12:
>

    STRETCH GOALS IN POUNDS (LINK)
column13:
>

“The Enigma Box” ® is just the beginning of a series of new and amazing extensions and sequels. From “The Rhomb” ® we will launch new challenges which will arrive in your inbox and which you can download to use with “The Enigma Box” ®, as it already includes enough elements and components to be used as a toolkit for solving new riddles. Besides these challenges, we will launch new boxes and extensions in the future.  

● Extensions: We are brainstorming boxes which will contain new riddles, 360º settings and virtual objects for augmented reality, based on other challenges and investigations. Some will arrive in the following months and are based on ancient cultures, like the Egyptians, or hunts for lost treasure such as the Holy Grail and those found in the tomb of Genghis Khan.
column14:
>

 ● New boxes: Once the final challenge in “The Enigma Box” ® has been discovered, we will not stop. We have a road map for the years ahead when we will create new boxes, which are not just there to develop history but also to enable you to acquire new skills and grow in many ways.
column16:
>

New technological trends herald great changes in the world around us, especially when it comes to investigation techniques and video games. This is why we want to use these developments to create a unique adventure, letting you experience something special, something new, never seen before.

So we have incorporated VR technology, AR technology and NFC chips. In “The Enigma Box” ® you will find the following technology:
column17:
>

App Deluxe  

The game in all its versions contains 360° virtual places around the world, virtual objects in augmented reality and a system for inserting coordinates and codes to unlock new places to explore. Depending on the amount of funding we achieve, we can also develop other functions such as:

● Scoreboards
● Rhomb Evolution: to track gameplay progress.
● Virtual map: to visualise unlocked points.
● Secret library: Exclusive material and top secret contents belonging to the society.
● New surprise features!

The app will be compatible with Android and iPhone devices and can be downloaded from the main stores with updates depending on how the game and its extensions develop.
column19:
>

We want you to be a part of this great revolution, taking up great challenges and discovering knowledge and secrets that have been buried for millennia. To do this we need adventurers, explorers, gamers, and people of all backgrounds who are prepared to immerse themselves in “The Enigma Box” ®, which is not only a game, it is also a great experience. 

As you can see from the videos and images, we have a box: “The Enigma Box” ®, which is fully functional. We have designed all the documents, pieces of art and riddles. We have also developed 3D and augmented reality technology for fully interactable virtual reality objects. We have closed a deal with different manufacturers and providers outlining the start of production with moulds and templates. Production of the box is not a problem, in addition to the money accumulated from Kickstarter, we can count on access to various venture capital funds to allow us to create an even higher quality experience.
column20:
>

The box will be limited to this campaign and we plan to offer additional purchases in the next months at a 35% premium on the initial campaign offer. This guarantees that the adventure and the objects of the box remain exclusive for a long period of time. You will be able to access new extensions and we will offer new games during the following months, so that the box remains entertaining, and you can have great fun and experience personal growth within it.  

We only have to produce and create the number of units which this launch will gather. We plan to make first deliveries to our customer in July 2018.
column21:
> 

Today (November 29, 2017) we visited our manufacturer to check the progress of the box production. All going fine! And we also have the first shots of our special Christmas gift.
column22:
>

 

FAQ

 

Can “The Enigma Box” to be played several times by different people ? Can I resale the box after finishing the experience?

You can play ""The Enigma Box"" challenge as many times as you want and with many different people. As long as you do not break or lose any important parts from the box!

You will have a digital copy of some riddles to print out whenever you need. And You will get the same experience with another group of explorers.

What if I get stuck?

You do not need to worry, our team will be always there to help you. For that reason we also planning to build a community (members only) so all members could communicate on the forum and help each other, exchange ideas etc.

We will do everything we can to help you if you encounter any problems.

How will I know which numbers on The Enigma Box Deluxe are still available?

Have a look at this file (numbers in red are already taken):

https://goo.gl/kHzo3b

What languages are available for The Enigma Box?

You will find the instructions, Booklet, welcome pack in English, Spanish and French. Everything that is necessary to follow the challenge.

The game is very visual and you don’t need to use the language a lot, but some riddles and puzzles will have a few words in English (only).
column23:
>

Until today the membership of “The Rhomb” ® was carefully curated with specific functions for specific objectives. Members come from different countries, cultures, and backgrounds, such as universities, exclusive clubs or investigation centers. We always rely on the latest technology to discover advances in history, which had been unresolved and unexplained.
column25:
>

This project is launched with the support of teams from London, Madrid and New York. We have been receiving help and guidance from chief experts in the field of historical challenges, explorers, high calibre designers, engineers, technologists, scientists. We have counted on international investment companies to back the project and make it a guaranteed success.
column26:
>

 At “The Rhomb” ® we have a passion for a job well done. We take pride in our finished product and aspire to reach the highest standards in quality having meticulously paid attention to the finest details. Each piece is a carefully designed and crafted component of the box and presented as a work of art
column27:
when completed all parts together will make a masterpiece, an object that really should be displayed in a museum... which is in fact precisely what we did with “The Enigma Box” ®.   

We are experts in adventures, challenges and designing logic games. Our team has years of experience in graphic arts and some of them are international leaders where it comes to designing new technology. We count on respected historians who have unveiled new tests, documents and have moved forward to amazing discoveries which have not even been made public yet. This combination of people and factors makes “The Enigma Box” ® a challenge that offers a unique experience exclusively available via Kickstarter. We believe this will be the next big thing in entertainment. Our goal is to make this one of the most amazing campaigns ever launched on this platform. 

Will you help us create this challenge?
Will you be a part of history?

Contact information

Web: www.theenigmabox.com

Email: info@theenigmabox.com   
Twitter: @TheEnigmaBox
Instagram: @theenimagbox

 

Riesgos y desafíos

CAMPAIGN GOALS

Licence

The Enigma Box™ - The Board Game has been developed by The Enigma Box Ltd with full support and licence from THE RHOMB. 
Products presented on this Indiegogo page and during the campaign may be subject to change in order to meet the expectations of the The Enigma Box Ltd licence agreement.

Challenges

Currently we have designs for all components, and have identified existing technologies we can use. Obviously, we are still missing some features that need to be completed and fine tuned. For example, we need to adapt all the 360º images and incorporate new elements into our augmented reality. The hardest part is done, however, as plans and materials are ready for mass production.

Our box has a variety of materials and objects and should any not be available when production begins, be it due to lack of stock or discontinuation, it will be replaced with a similar item.

By pledging on this Kickstarter you acknowledge that the final look and contents of the pledges may change and differ from what is presented at the start of the campaign.

We have estimated the delivery for July 2018 but please understand this is only an estimate. Due to the global logistics involved in shipping, some regions may receive their pledges sooner than others.

We are prepared with our production as much as possible, however we will refund pledges if for some unforeseen reason the game cannot be delivered at all. We will be unable to refund the charges incurred by Indiegogo and Pledge Manager or other charges for your payment (PayPal, VISA, credit card...). This represents approximately 15% of the full payment.

Refunds

All pledges can be refunded up to 15 days after the end of the Indiegogo campaign. We will be unable to refund you the charges incurred by Indiegogo and Pledge Manager or other charges for your payment (PayPal, VISA, credit card...). This represents approximately 15% of the full payment.

After we have started the packaging and shipment process (around 6-8 weeks before the actual shipping date) we will no longer be able to proceed any refunds.

This project is being funded in GBP and any refunds will be also processed in GBP.

Terms and Conditions

We’ve been consulting our manufacturer and shipping company about reducing the box's weight to keep the shipping costs down. In order to make sure that these costs are as low as possible we will be charging shipping after the campaign ends. Backers will gain access to our Pledge Manager by email roughly two months after this campaigns completion. 
Below are our initial rough estimates of shipping costs of the core game. These costs may rise due to weight increase when more items are unlocked via stretch goals and when extra purchases are added to the box.

USA: £26 - $34 
UNITED KINGDOM: £15- $19 
CANADA: £31- $40 
EUROPE: £19 - $24 
AUSTRALIA: £31- $40 
OTHERS: Shipping cost to other countries will vary depending on the area.

Unfortunately, due to customs regulations, we are not able to ship to Russia, Afghanistan, Ukraine or Kazakhstan.

You agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information, and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret that we are unable to ship to PO Boxes.
If you do not accept the proposed terms please do not pledge on this Indiegogo project and wait for the global general release.

","NEW CAMPAIGN!!!!!!!!!

column1: Enigma Crime Scene: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/enigma-crime...

We reached the funding goal in under 3 days!! Thank you guys!!The Enigma Box: The biggest adventure of all time, from your front room. We want to offer you a challenge and an experience based on historical events, full of enigmas and mysteries that will test your wits. This challenge is for adventurers, gamers, mystery seekers, puzzle-solvers and the curious minded who want to immerse themselves in the biggest collection of enigmas ever. Using the most advanced technology you will travel to incredible locations around the world without leaving your front room. You can either play on your own, supported by your friends or with anyone you consider fit to face the challenge. We guarantee that this experience will not leave you unsatisfied
column2: it is designed and supported by world class experts in the fields of technology, history and entertainment.  ● The Ultimate experience, from your front room. An adventure across time and into far off lands. Placing the most advanced technology and analyses of thousands of years worth of riddles into the palm of your hands.  It's time to try new things!● More than 6000 minutes of challenging enigmas and interactive adventures. The goal is to decipher the mystery of 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the Secret of Secrets, the unique item that will change the destiny of humankind.● You will use latest generation technology: virtual reality, augmented reality, graphene, 3D printing, NFC chips and more.● All those who complete the game, regardless of how long it takes them and what methods are used, will gain access to an epic VR finale and a special international event (streaming & physical location, gifts, surprises, etc).● “The Enigma Box” ® is just the beginning, we will launch new challenges which will arrive in your email and which you can download for free to use with your box. Some of the new extensions are available now. ● This challenge will boost your dexterity and intuition
column3: it will increase your understanding of the world and next-level thinking
column4: enhance your knowledge  and your skills
column5: expand your contacts and, most of all,  you’ll have a great time! ● It is a game for people of all ages, genders, and backgrounds. You do not have to have pre-existing skills or knowledge to fully enjoy the adventure.● You can play Enigma Box as a Team Building actividad / game for companies.We are working with Backerkit

column1: Will history know your name? The places, explorations and investigations in this challenge are based on real events, which will guarantee the greatest adventure of a lifetime.  Chance, technology and intuition guided us to find hidden messages which gave us the coordinates of a late XIXth century box buried in the French Pyrenees. What we found forms part of an unprecedented discovery, as it allowed us to access knowledge, data and cryptograms belonging to a secret society. These cryptograms contain a revelation which may change how we understand the world. With all the research, enigmas, and new revelations, the team from “The Rhomb” have designed an international challenge and a new form of entertainment which will change the way games are made, revolutionizing and creating a definitive experience never seen before and giving you a chance to discover the ""Arcanum Arcanorum"", the Secret of Secrets We invite you to discover an odyssey in a world full of plots and enigmas. An intense experience which will take you to a multitude of incredible places around the world, without even leaving your front room! Your goal is to discover the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the Secret of Secrets. We do not want to unveil all the secrets and mysteries that the box hides, as it contains compartments, secret riddles and games, which you will have to discover on your own as you progress through the adventure, but we understand and think it is fair, that you should know what is included in it and what you are buying when you join this adventure. In detail and with pictures:  Included:
Welcome pack: Booklet, Card and letter for The Rhomb society​
​Enigma Box with compartments, codes, tools and secrets
The experience and adventure of a lifetime
​Secret Code T-Shirt and “The Rhomb” Pin
More than 60 riddles and puzzles
Mobile (Android and iOS) App Content
30 Investigation and historical documents
Metaphysical and alchemical figures
Augmented and Virtual Reality objects
Eight 360-degree space access
Virtual Reality glasses
Board Game Map with exclusive physical and virtual contents
Work tools: UV ink pens, compass, extendable pen with magnet, etc
Graphene key with NFC chip​
​150 Enigma cards

● The Box: The box itself holds all elements of “The Enigma Box” ® challenge you will need in the game. It also hides secrets and components which you need to discover and which support other enigmas. It contains the necessary tools that will help you at all times and that will guide you when lost. It will shed light on how to progress.  ●  Welcome pack (Card and letter for The Rhomb society): The first thing you see will be the welcome letter. A numbered card which gives you immediate access to “The Rhomb” ® society and its discoveries and secrets reserved exclusively for members. We will provide you with codes to access the site and app so that you can begin to unlock 3D scenes and virtual objects with your phone (iOS or Android).● Booklet: The Arcanum book is a key element. Here you will find instructions on how to advance in the game, hints, images, exclusive information and everything else you will need in order to complete the adventure.  ● More than 60 riddles and puzzles: The box contains over 60 riddles hidden in its compartments, including the Kit Card, Substitution Enigma, 3D puzzles, Scylates Cylinder, Chinese Shadows, and many more you have never seen. You will need to discover and resolve these either on your own or with your team.● 30 Investigation and historical documents: You will find clues such as X-rays, passports, paintings and photos. Each one of these elements forms part of one or multiple riddle. You must use your ingenuity to see how and where they combine, when to use them, and how they help you progress to the end. ● Virtual Reality glasses: One of the important elements of the game is the opportunity to 'travel' to real places around the world. Thanks to VR glasses and the app on your mobile (iOS or Android), you will be able to unlock scenes using coordinates and key codes. Each unlocked set of coordinates will allow you to access a specific place where you can investigate different scenarios. When using your goggles you will be transported there with 360 degree vision, being able to look all around you, seeking clues and riddles to move the adventure forward. This is the first time ever that anyone has used this technology to create a 100% real and virtual game to progress in a unique adventure. It is a never seen before experience!● Board Game Map with exclusive physical and virtual contents: All great journeys and amazing tabletop games need a map and a table. In this case we have created a special map where you will find riddles and clues, see 3D elements through your mobile app, and locate physical figures with which you will build or depict diagrams. This is your base of operations, which will help you to move around the world trying to find the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the final secret hidden beneath the history, alchemy and astrology.   ● Secret Code T-Shirt and “The Rhomb” Pin: Belonging to “The Rhomb” ® society also means wearing the distinctive emblem. The pin will help you stand out and allow you to recognize other members involved in the hunt with whom you can share experiences and knowledge. The T-shirt is not just an emblem, it also hides diagrams, secrets, and riddles. It includes a virtual image which you will only be able to unlock by viewing it with your augmented reality app. ● Tool Box with compartments, codes, tools and secrets: From time to time you will need tools to help you progress through challenges, so we have supplied you with some useful items: an extender with tools including a magnet, a LED light, a ruler and a balance.    ● Metaphysical and Alchemical figures: We have prepared a series of figures which will assist you with the challenges, some of them are alchemic figures with symbols you must align, others have historical references, but they all have a purpose that you must discover in the game.   ● Enigma Cards: You will find different cards with challenges, characters, symbols that you must use when you find yourself stuck or want to learn more about the story.  Including QR codes  with secret content. ● Graphene key with NFC chip:  We are pioneering the use of graphene, named “God's material” due to its incredible abilities and often considered the most powerful material in nature, possessing the greatest electric and thermal conductivity ever known.  The key is coated with graphene.● Eight places/scenes accessible via 360-degree Virtual Reality glasses: You will also be able to unlock new areas and access new 360º scenes. To do so you must insert the coordinates and key words. The App     The box is an entry point into a realm that will allow you to travel to remote places and access confidential and exclusive information. To enable all these functions we have designed an app you can download on your phone (iOS or Android) or access via your computer.     The app will have greater functionality depending on the amount of money raised by the campaign meaning we start with basic features: coordinates, 360 VR spaces, and access to augmented reality. Later on we can include: a central hub, progress tracking in the game, global leaderboards, a world map displaying unlocked coordinates, a library of classified content, and more.      Finally, you will form part of a prestigious society, “The Rhomb” ®. Members can share, collaborate, and access exclusive knowledge. As a member of the club you will be able to attend exclusive events.  Will you take part in this great revolution and help us to make this a reality?At the end of the campaign we will offer some extra items: t-shirts, extensions, pins, etc.For those looking for even greater prestige and fame, and to deepen their knowledge with exclusive information, we have designed the “Enigma Box Deluxe”. This is a limited version: no more than 1033 units will be available! The “Enigma Box Deluxe” contains the same elements as the original box plus the following additions:
Included:
An NFC ring to unlock information
Additional riddles and exclusive ‘The Rhomb’ documents
Previously unseen 360 scenes via mobile app
Unpublished images and photographs from the discovery and opening
VIP membership to The Rhomb Secret Society
Exclusive access to experiences, demos and events
Access to discoveries far sooner than anyone else
A secret item

● Welcome Pack:        - Welcome VIP card and VIP membership card: Exclusive access to experiences, demos and events.      - VIP membership certificate: Access to discoveries far sooner than anyone else.● Exclusive Tech Accessories:      - NFC ring to contactless unlock content.      - Bracelet with hidden USB loaded with exclusive information    - Wallet with card tools● Advanced Riddles:      - Magnifying glasses with lights    - Box with a secret lock and its surprising content     - Exclusive alchemy riddle    - Labyrinth with advanced content    - “Cube Circuit” riddle    - A ""3 phase circular"" cryptogram   ●  Documents: Unpublished images and photographs from the discovery of the box  and its opening. Previously unseen 360° VR scenes: With new clues and content. The objective is to find the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the Secret of Secrets, hidden in a specific place in the world and kept there by powerful groups and secret societies.  To do this you have “The Enigma Box”, which contains the documents, maps, riddles, and materials you will need to find this secret. You will also need to apply your ingenuity and investigative skills to advance in this adventure, either on your own or with companions who may join you in your quest. You will also make use of the most advanced technology in the fields of virtual reality and augmented reality, objects designed with graphene, and content stored in NFC chips.   We are offering you a type of a game never seen before, a radical change in the way you experience a unique adventure from home. You can either play on your own, supported by your friends or with anyone you consider fit to face the challenge. We have combined an incredible story based on real events, comprising a gripping atmosphere, the most astonishing riddles, the most advanced technology, and the possibility to become a part of history.Of course you will be able to make safer progress and enjoy your experience more if you are accompanied in this journey by friends, as together you can support each other when you are stuck, exchange different perspectives, and discover clues that you may have missed.  We have prepared a grand finale which will give you exclusive access to new information and new experiences. Only the chosen ones can reach the end and access the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', the Secret of Secrets. Will you be one of them?  To reach the end you must face the greatest Multiple Enigma of all time, decrypt riddles, solve cryptograms, and test yourself. Each of these challenges will allow you to unlock coordinates to different places in the world, all accessible through your VR glasses. You will really believe you are there, thanks to the incredible technology and VR glasses, allowing you to access subterranean crypts in medieval castles, empty beaches surrounded by dangerous jungles, or the bustling, mysterious streets of Marrakesh. All without leaving your house. You will feel like one of the greatest adventurers of all time, travelling the world hunting for clues. You really will enjoy our experience, with each new destination providing access to a virtual place, where you will find clues and riddles. This is just the beginning, as the box and its mysteries will continue to support your progress, allowing you to find the next coordinates you will need to find the next place to visit.Website references
PC & Tech Authority - (Australia): http://bit.ly/2zyNleK
The Dice Bear"": http://thedicebear.com/2017/11/07/the-bears-pick-of-kickstarter-tabletop-games-oct-31-to-nov-6/
Dice Tower"": http://www.dicetowernews.com/discover-real-secrets-with-the-enigma-box-now-on-kickstarter/47758
Table Top Gaming News"": http://www.tabletopgamingnews.com/the-enigma-box-game-up-on-kickstarter/

The box together with the riddles contained in it and the virtual worlds you can access (using your computer or smartphone) will all allow you to find coordinates and key words which will help you progress in the adventure. The booklet in the box will guide you through each location in the world so you know exactly what it is you need to be looking for and which enigmas may be part of it. Not everything is important. You need to find the exact combinations of objects, riddles and information to make progress.  Once you have all the numbers for a coordinate, you must enter them in the app or via your computer. This will unlock a new spot in the world which you must investigate through virtual reality, counting on new content made available via augmented reality.Your new objective is to find the place in the world which will unlock the next clue, using the 360º VR contents and the riddles in the box. You must progress through the most mystical and mysterious places on the planet until you find your final goal and discover just what the 'Arcanum Arcanorum', or the Secret of Secrets, really is.Some riddles in action:    What languages are available for The Enigma Box? You will find the instructions, Booklet, welcome pack in English, Spanish and French. Everything that is necessary to follow the challenge. The game is very visual and you don’t need to use the language a lot, but some riddles and puzzles will have a few words in English (only).   The grand epic finaleEnigma Box challenge's final goal is Arcanum, which can be achieved by solving many puzzles, riddles and enigmas. All those who complete the game by the closing date (May 31, 2019), regardless of how long it takes them and what methods are used, will gain access to an epic VR finale and a special event (streaming & physical location).Are you going to miss out on all that?   We want to thank our backers for their support when we reach specific goals, so we will establish a system of unlocking new challenges, pieces, riddles, and 360º virtual spaces. This will enhance the experience and add a new dynamic to the game. The reward scheme is as follows:    STRETCH GOALS IN POUNDS (LINK)“The Enigma Box” ® is just the beginning of a series of new and amazing extensions and sequels. From “The Rhomb” ® we will launch new challenges which will arrive in your inbox and which you can download to use with “The Enigma Box” ®, as it already includes enough elements and components to be used as a toolkit for solving new riddles. Besides these challenges, we will launch new boxes and extensions in the future.  ●  Extensions: We are brainstorming boxes which will contain new riddles, 360º settings and virtual objects for augmented reality, based on other challenges and investigations. Some will arrive in the following months and are based on ancient cultures, like the Egyptians, or hunts for lost treasure such as the Holy Grail and those found in the tomb of Genghis Khan. ● New boxes: Once the final challenge in “The Enigma Box” ® has been discovered, we will not stop. We have a road map for the years ahead when we will create new boxes, which are not just there to develop history but also to enable you to acquire new skills and grow in many ways. New technological trends herald great changes in the world around us, especially when it comes to investigation techniques and video games. This is why we want to use these developments to create a unique adventure, letting you experience something special, something new, never seen before.So we have incorporated VR technology, AR technology and NFC chips. In “The Enigma Box” ® you will find the following technology:App Deluxe  The game in all its versions contains 360° virtual places around the world, virtual objects in augmented reality and a system for inserting coordinates and codes to unlock new places to explore. Depending on the amount of funding we achieve, we can also develop other functions such as:● Scoreboards● Rhomb Evolution: to track gameplay progress.● Virtual map: to visualise unlocked points.● Secret library: Exclusive material and top secret contents belonging to the society.● New surprise features!The app will be compatible with Android and iPhone devices and can be downloaded from the main stores with updates depending on how the game and its extensions develop. We want you to be a part of this great revolution, taking up great challenges and discovering knowledge and secrets that have been buried for millennia. Backers will gain access to our Pledge Manager by email roughly two months after this campaigns completion. Below are our initial rough estimates of shipping costs of the core game. These costs may rise due to weight increase when more items are unlocked via stretch goals and when extra purchases are added to the box.USA: £26 - $34 UNITED KINGDOM: £15- $19 CANADA: £31- $40 EUROPE: £19 - $24 AUSTRALIA: £31- $40 OTHERS: Shipping cost to other countries will vary depending on the area.Unfortunately, due to customs regulations, we are not able to ship to Russia, Afghanistan, Ukraine or Kazakhstan.You agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information, and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret that we are unable to ship to PO Boxes.If you do not accept the proposed terms please do not pledge on this Indiegogo project and wait for the global general release.",62.0,0,"1 Campaign

You love your games. So why would you trust a cheap plastic bag to transport your games around?

At GeekOn! we believe that your board games deserve the absolute best. The good news? We have the best way to carry your games. The bad news? You currently don’t… for now.

column2:
>

                                                                        

In our quest to design the best boardgame bag we focused on 3 main points. Protection, Organization &

column5:
>

 

Expandable game section allowing you to keep the bag compact to carry a few games but able to transform into a huge game cave for those times it’s your turn to bring all the games.Which let’s face it, is everytime.
column8: >

column1:
Sure we could've made the bag with inexpensive materials but that would leave your bags open to fray and tear and to also get that odd ""fuzzed out"" issue which honestly make your bag look terrible. Trust me I have a super comfy pair of pants that got all fuzzy and I can only wear it around the house for fear of ridicule. We don't want you to only wear these bags around the house so we opted for the best quality materials!

Inexpensive materials would also leave your games open to getting ruined from the elements. That's why we went with a water-resistant 500D rip-stop nylon that provides significant tear and abrasion resistance with the interwoven materials helping to keep any rips from spreading and leaving your games at risk!

One surprise rainy day could catch you off guard and your tote bag just won’t cut it. Without these waterproof zippers you risk ruining your board games which means you coming into game night empty handed. You had the best games of the night and now the only game left to play is Battleship and everyone hates you. We don't want everyone to hate you so we opted for the extra large waterproof zippers. You're welcome.

The shoulder straps on our bags are made out of moisture wicking mesh. What does that mean? It means that our mesh wicks moisture. No one likes sitting next to someone who’s been soaked through their shirt. Extra padding on the shoulder straps will make it seem as though you’re carrying nothing at all. But don’t forget you’re actually carrying your backpack because that could get ugly real quick. 

DISCLAIMER - GeekOn! Accepts no liability in the event you forget you’re wearing the backpack and get caught between subway doors on the way to or from game night.

Adjustable shoulder straps allows you to adjust the bag to its most comfortable position whether you’re a low-carrier to show off that new neck tattoo or prefer to keep your backpack up high to relieve pressure on your back.
A Sternum Strap allows the bag to stay secure to your body to help distribute the bag weight, and as a plus, chicks dig Sternum Straps.

The back part of the backpack uses the same awesome moisture wicking mesh (you know, the mesh that wicks moisture we were talking about before?) with extra padding to keep your back feeling like you’re carrying a cloud. A cloud full of board games.
Speaking about padding… we made sure to add padding to the grab handle too. Now the handle won’t dig into your hand and make you cry… something I definitely don’t do...
Just plain generic zipper pulls wouldn't do so we've got custom rubber zipper pulls on each bag to match the inside color of the bags!
Your laptop can join the fun too with its own dedicated padded pocket that fits 15"" laptops! Maybe when AI becomes more advanced it can play too.

You know when you walk around asking everyone where your sunglasses are only to find out that they're resting on your head? Well we've sewn a strip on each side of the shoulder straps for you to clip your sunglasses to so the next time you walk around asking if anyone's seen your sunglasses your friends won't have to point quite as high up.
Pen Slot included, how else are you going to markdown how many times you’ve made your friends cry?
Keep track of how many times you’ve smoked your friends in Catan with a dedicated section for your notepads and extra game manuals.

Getting to game night sure can make a gamer thirsty. That’s why there’s an easily accessible side water bottle pocket. Still thirsty? There’s also a second bottle pocket on the other side of the bag for more water or to hold your celebratory beer for after you dominate the night!

We made is easy to carry all your essentials with various sized zipper and elastic pockets under the main bag flap. These pockets are perfect for your tech accessories, extra pens, markers, card games, snacks etc. Feel free to share your snacks with everyone but we recommend keeping your chapstick to yourself.

There is an over-sized zippered pocket on each side of the bag above the koozie pockets. These pockets are perfect for those smaller card games like Sushi Go, Uno, Dos or in a few years when they release Tres.
Store your sunglasses and tech in their dedicated pocket at the top of the backpack. The pocket is protected so the sunglasses that you “borrowed” from your friend Mark won’t break.

Keep your keys, keycards, transit cards, etc easily within reach in the conveniently placed shoulder strap pocket. I personally keep a whistle on mine and blow it whenever someone over-rolls the dice and messes up the board! ( I don’t have many friends left…)
Keep your dice tray and dice case under a dedicated elastic strap in the top section.
We've got three velcro pockets in the top section of the bag which are perfect for securing cards or larger card games in their boxes.
We went through months of designing, testing, re-designing and re-testing until we came up with a bag that we felt confident would hold up to everything we thought a solid boardgame bag should be!

Learn in Minutes - Takes minutes to learn but a lifetime to master
Game is Quick - 5-10 minutes to play a round
Play with 2-10 People - Play with a wide array of people
Hilarious New Rules - Each round a new rule card is drawn. These rules are hilarious and keep the game new and fresh.
Our Story

Power Struggle came to be because we played the card game Presidents and Assholes for years. We discovered that everyone played the game differently which resulted in arguments about the rules. Also, the “President"" is supposed to generate a new rule each game, and the same boring rules would be created over and over. People just didn’t enjoy coming up with new rules on the spot.

We said to ourselves, “This game is really fun but it has some problems. If we fixed those problems we would have a really, really fun game."" So, we went to work. It took a couple  of months, but we took this game and turned it into something amazingly fun. We hope you enjoy it and create memories with friends and family that last for years.
Strategy

Power Struggle is a card game that can be played while drinking or not drinking. It is highly strategic and extremely rewarding to win. The deck is made up of number cards and wild cards that need to be played at the correct time to help you win.

The winner of the game is the president and is the ruler for the next game. The game is all about power and is a hilarious way to spend a night with friends.  The player that wins the most rounds is the winner in the end.
Wild Cards
Drink - The person you choose has to drink
Cheers - Everyone has to stop and cheers. (Depending on the rule at the time, there will probably be a toast also)
Clear - All the cards are cleared off the board and any card can be played.
Rules Deck
Laugh out Loud Fun- Make your friends do hilarious things
Every Round Changes - President draws a new rule card every round
Plenty of Rules- 50 rule cards per deck

Shitcoin Survivors: 2018 Capitulation Pack
Crypto market is tanking like there is no tomorrow.
Your bags are heavy, but selling is only for weak hands - so you hodl on.
You were told there would be lambos, but all you found were craps… and Bitconnect.
You tell yourself you are in it for the technology, while you cry yourself to sleep every night.
But… all might not be lost.
Claim the glory, beat your friends, be the last to capitulate and survive the world of shitcoins.
What You Get
For each utility game set, you will receive:
<ul>
• A box! This is a special piece of equipment specifically designed to hodl cards.
• An instruction booklet. 20 pages of indigenous, handcrafted, smooth paper and wording. Seriously though, just play the game.
<li>62 matte, slightly water-resistant cards (42 unique designs). <ul>
• 4x Rekt cards
• 6x Whale cards
• 5x Cancel cards
• 4x Dump cards
• 4x Do(d)ge cards
• 4x Airdrop cards
• 4x Mix cards
• 5x Oracle cards
• 1x Regulator card
• 25x People cards (five of each)
• Other perks include beautiful T-shirts, stickers, and many more! (secret perks will be unlocked once we have reached 100% of our goal)
About us

Band Protocol is a decentralized data curation protocol. Using cryptoprimitives like bonding curve, on-chain governance, TCR.....anyways, while toiling away at our deep protocol stuff and implementing ERC97510, we thought we can curate some fun game during this harsh bear market.

While crypto market continues to tank and most speculators left, we are in a good buidling period. Watching our shitcoins going to zero, we came up with Shitcoin Survivors as a fun game for the crypto community - a keepsake for those that are still in the market after 2018 capitulation. At least when our grandchildren ask what happened in 2018, we can all proudly present them with this game and tell them the story of boom and bust. Truly once in a lifetime experience.

We need your support to bring this game to life! Please spread the words and be sure to get you, your friends at crypto conference, and your Telegram followers some fun crypto games to entertain them before the next bull comes (where you will get your 2020 Bitcoin halving edition!).
Share and spread the love. It means a lot to us!
- The Shitcoin Survivors of 2018
shitcoinsurvivors.com

B&
column3:
DESIGN WORKS LLC

""OLD WEST SCENERY"" is the brand name for B&
column4:
T's N-Scale old west scenery items.

At the heart of B&
column5:
T MODEL RAILROAD, is a close group of friends and team members that all share the same passion for the greatest hobby in the world, model railroading.

B&
column6:
T OLD WEST SCENERY products are created using 3D laser “Additive Manufacturing”.  This process allows us to print our models as complete units, eliminating hours of cutting and gluing tiny little parts together from kits.

In addition, we benefit from rapid inventory production and order fulfillment with ZERO long-term inventory investment.

Funding: Where The Money Will Go

We’re seeking $100,000 for our initial funding campaign.

With your support, we’ll be able to expand our market with professional packaging and advertising and begin offering B&
column7:
T products in both online and storefront hobby shops.

No Risk Contributions

Since B&
column8:
T is already in production and shipping from our own website, ""Product Perks"" will be shipped in a matter of days once your contribution is received.

Badges, Table Top and Coffee Table Layouts, as well our resident artist, Cat Lafitte's original paintings are produced to order. Badges take a few weeks while Table Top, Coffee Tables Layouts, and Paintings have a 30 - 90 day lead time after your final design approval. 

For a complete breakdown of where your money will go, please visit our crowdfunding page at: 

http://www.oldwestscenery.com/

If you’re unable to contribute during our official campaign, please help us by spreading the word on social media and remember to use the Indiegogo Share Tools!

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
You can see a separate demo video which shows how the game works completely

UPDATE: Will make a separate way to play the game, that will include cards, roles/special abilities to each figure and more strategy. There will be two ways to play it, a simple one, like now, and a more complicated one so that this game can appeal to a larger audience!
<ul>
<li>
My name is Anton-Constantin Anastassov, I live in Bulgaria. I am 17 and I have been making drawings and paintings.
• Moreover, I have had exhibitions in Bulgaria and the United States.
<li>

This is my first board game, it's called ""Corridors of Shadows"". It connects the art that I like to make and something that entertains people. A lot of interesting ideas were put in this game​. It has been play tested by many of my friends and strangers, who have definitely said they enjoyed it a lot.
<li>
Contributors will help me spread the game to more people because I am confident that it would be so amusing for them!
<h3>What We Need &amp
<ul>

• This game is expensive to produce, unfortunately. So for 200 copies of this game, we require roughly 6000 dollars to make each of the parts of the game. They are the box, the fold-able board game mat, moon tokens, figures and dice.
• If you pay 20$ you will get a pendant that you could wear as a necklace that is made by me, it will look like the moons you win in the game.  It brings you fortune in the game.
• People who donate 50$ will get a signed print of one of my artworks.
• The people who donate 200$ or more will get an original artwork of mine. (21.0 x 29.7cm)
• Whoever donates 600$ will get a clay figure from the game, an original artwork, signed print, and a moon necklace/token.

• Finally, if someone contributes 1000$ or more, they will get the complete board game, 2 signed prints of my work, an original artwork of mine and I will make a custom artwork for them, like a portrait or something else they want.
• Those who donate 30$ or more will receive the game if the goal is reached.
• The funds will go towards making as much board games as possible. If the goal is not reached, less than 200 games will be made.
The Impact
<ul>

• This project is valuable to the contributor and to the world because I am sure that this game will entertain and amuse others a lot. The funds will allow me to distribute it easier, and sell it at a lower price, like 30$.
• I am young but I have ideas that could make the life of others more enjoyable.
<h3>Risks &amp
<ul>
• In Bulgaria, this industry is almost not developed at all, so the parts of the game must be made in another country, which makes everything very expensive.

• The pleasure of the game can be truly understood only when you have played it for yourself. A lot of people who haven't played the game, may think that it is not fun. But everyone who has play tested it, says it is!

• Board game players criticize this game for not being innovative enough but I disagree. Unique doesn't always equal good. First of all, the most important aspect of a game is for it to be fun to play. This is proven to be true for this game. Second, ""Corridors of Shadows"" is a game that combines my art and classic board games with some unique elements that I made up. It is not supposed to be an entirely novel thing, but it does have unusual sides! It's beautiful and entertaining.
• Since one example of the game has been produced in Germany successfully, I think a larger number of games should be made there.
• I will contact board game publishers in all ways that I can.
Other Ways You Can Help
• If you cannot contribute, do not worry. You can tell others about this campaign by sharing it!
<h3><span style=""font-size: 30px
FACEBOOK PAGE
INSTAGRAM PROFILE
DEVIANT ART
• On the back of the box is written:

""You have fallen into an illusory realm. Some dreams are beautiful, others are frightening. At every dark corner, there are beings born from imagination and nightmares. They have prepared cunning traps to stop you from reaching the end. You think you are walking forward, but you are going back. You are sinking in places where only incredible luck can save you. Fortunately, there are surprises that will help you reach the exit. The Moon illuminates your path through the obscure labyrinth. Moons will help you and other players. Your goal is to get to the finish first, by using wisely the chances that the game offers you. Good luck in this exciting journey of light and shadow!""

","You can see a separate demo video which shows how the game works completely

UPDATE: Will make a separate way to play the game, that will include cards, roles/special abilities to each figure and more strategy. There will be two ways to play it, a simple one, like now, and a more complicated one so that this game can appeal to a larger audience!
My name is Anton-Constantin Anastassov, I live in Bulgaria. I am 17 and I have been making drawings and paintings.
Moreover, I have had exhibitions in Bulgaria and the United States.

This is my first board game, it's called ""Corridors of Shadows"". It connects the art that I like to make and something that entertains people. A lot of interesting ideas were put in this game​. It has been play tested by many of my friends and strangers, who have definitely said they enjoyed it a lot.
Contributors will help me spread the game to more people because I am confident that it would be so amusing for them!
What We Need & What You Get

This game is expensive to produce, unfortunately. So for 200 copies of this game, we require roughly 6000 dollars to make each of the parts of the game. They are the box, the fold-able board game mat, moon tokens, figures and dice.
If you pay 20$ you will get a pendant that you could wear as a necklace that is made by me, it will look like the moons you win in the game.  It brings you fortune in the game.
People who donate 50$ will get a signed print of one of my artworks.
The people who donate 200$ or more will get an original artwork of mine. (21.0 x 29.7cm)
Whoever donates 600$ will get a clay figure from the game, an original artwork, signed print, and a moon necklace/token.

Finally, if someone contributes 1000$ or more, they will get the complete board game, 2 signed prints of my work, an original artwork of mine and I will make a custom artwork for them, like a portrait or something else they want.
Those who donate 30$ or more will receive the game if the goal is reached.
The funds will go towards making as much board games as possible. If the goal is not reached, less than 200 games will be made.
The Impact

This project is valuable to the contributor and to the world because I am sure that this game will entertain and amuse others a lot. The funds will allow me to distribute it easier, and sell it at a lower price, like 30$.
I am young but I have ideas that could make the life of others more enjoyable.
Risks & Challenges
In Bulgaria, this industry is almost not developed at all, so the parts of the game must be made in another country, which makes everything very expensive.

The pleasure of the game can be truly understood only when you have played it for yourself. A lot of people who haven't played the game, may think that it is not fun. But everyone who has play tested it, says it is!

Board game players criticize this game for not being innovative enough but I disagree. Unique doesn't always equal good. First of all, the most important aspect of a game is for it to be fun to play. This is proven to be true for this game. Second, ""Corridors of Shadows"" is a game that combines my art and classic board games with some unique elements that I made up. It is not supposed to be an entirely novel thing, but it does have unusual sides! It's beautiful and entertaining.
Since one example of the game has been produced in Germany successfully, I think a larger number of games should be made there.
I will contact board game publishers in all ways that I can.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot contribute, do not worry. You can tell others about this campaign by sharing it!
CONTACT/LINKS:
FACEBOOK PAGE
INSTAGRAM PROFILE
DEVIANT ART
On the back of the box is written:

You have fallen into an illusory realm. Some dreams are beautiful, others are frightening. At every dark corner, there are beings born from imagination and nightmares. They have prepared cunning traps to stop you from reaching the end. You think you are walking forward, but you are going back. You are sinking in places where only incredible luck can save you. Fortunately, there are surprises that will help you reach the exit. The Moon illuminates your path through the obscure labyrinth. Moons will help you and other players. Your goal is to get to the finish first, by using wisely the chances that the game offers you. Good luck in this exciting journey of light and shadow!""",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Ever since I started The Folio I've wanted to take a different look at gaming and go back to the heady days of the late 70s and early 80s and robust swords &
column2: sorcery storytelling.  When I was a kid life was different, tropes were different and seemingly more acceptable, and I wanted to create a Folio line that brought some of that era back into the light.

column1: The Folio: Black Label is going to have a more adult edge than is found in the standard Folio, and yes, there might be some nudity, and maybe some horror, and maybe a twisted quality here or there, but at the base its really just about the unfettered fun of hacking and slashing your way through a pulp style adventure with blatant evil doers, magical treasures, and exposed flesh.
So, I'm throwing out the playbook for 2019, and turning the flux capacitor back to the early days of gaming.  I hope some of you will join me.

Why Only 150? Well, because The Folio: Black Label isn't for everyone, and as such I didn't want to create something mass market, but instead make a collectors item that a person can use to gloat over their friends with, just like you did when you were a kid and got the latest D&
column2: D supplement :)  So, I'm going to make 150 of these and let the chips fall where they may.  Also, I'm going to do stretch goals in the number of folks in the campaign, and not the dollar total since that will be capped for the most part.

column1: Great Cover, who did it?  Well, it is an incredible painting by former TSR artist Daniel Horne!  If you want to check out more of his incredible work, and help him continue to paint awesome fantasy, why not check out his GoFundMe that is currently running!  You can find it here: https://www.gofundme.com/keep-classic-painted-f...
AND, you can also find Daniel's work on an interior centerfold of one of the primary antagonists! So here is a sneak peak!

column2: D gaming mechanics, while also have 'grey' stat and  treasure blocks for 5th Edition D&
column3: D,  so it is easily playable in  BOTH formats.  It has been designed for  6-8 characters, roughly 3rd  through 5th, and will include a Virtual  Table Top map without secret doors, traps, and numbers.

column1: What does the adventure for The Sins of the Three Sisters revolve around? Well, this will be a standard swords &
column2: sorcery based adventure that is based around a corrupted swamp with three old temples that are plaguing the lands with undead, monsters, and dark magic.  The initial adventure will include  a 3 temple for exploration adventure featuring all of the 'three sisters'.

column1: Can we see some of the 3D Folio Maps? Absolutely, and this one could possibly have 3 such maps, as well as the standard 'blue' maps common to early modules.

What are all the other Folio products? The Folio adventure series has typically been in physical form and can be found at artofthegenre.com.  Thus far, there  have been  21 Folio standard removable cover adventures, and 5 hardcover Folio books  (3 compile and reprint the Folio campaigns, and 2 are gaming supplements).  You can see more about these products in the video  below.  Here is a video of me showing some of them.  It's and older video, sir, but it checks out.

","Ever since I started The Folio I've wanted to take a different look at gaming and go back to the heady days of the late 70s and early 80s and robust swords & sorcery storytelling.  When I was a kid life was different, tropes were different and seemingly more acceptable, and I wanted to create a Folio line that brought some of that era back into the light.

The Folio: Black Label is going to have a more adult edge than is found in the standard Folio, and yes, there might be some nudity, and maybe some horror, and maybe a twisted quality here or there, but at the base its really just about the unfettered fun of hacking and slashing your way through a pulp style adventure with blatant evil doers, magical treasures, and exposed flesh.
So, I'm throwing out the playbook for 2019, and turning the flux capacitor back to the early days of gaming.  I hope some of you will join me.

Why Only 150? Well, because The Folio: Black Label isn't for everyone, and as such I didn't want to create something mass market, but instead make a collectors item that a person can use to gloat over their friends with, just like you did when you were a kid and got the latest D&D supplement :)  So, I'm going to make 150 of these and let the chips fall where they may.  Also, I'm going to do stretch goals in the number of folks in the campaign, and not the dollar total since that will be capped for the most part.

Great Cover, who did it?  Well, it is an incredible painting by former TSR artist Daniel Horne!  If you want to check out more of his incredible work, and help him continue to paint awesome fantasy, why not check out his GoFundMe that is currently running!  You can find it here: https://www.gofundme.com/keep-classic-painted-f...
AND, you can also find Daniel's work on an interior centerfold of one of the primary antagonists! So here is a sneak peak!

Who is this adventure for?: It will be based around  classic AD&D gaming mechanics, while also have 'grey' stat and  treasure blocks for 5th Edition D&D,  so it is easily playable in  BOTH formats.  It has been designed for  6-8 characters, roughly 3rd  through 5th, and will include a Virtual  Table Top map without secret doors, traps, and numbers.

What does the adventure for The Sins of the Three Sisters revolve around? Well, this will be a standard swords & sorcery based adventure that is based around a corrupted swamp with three old temples that are plaguing the lands with undead, monsters, and dark magic.  The initial adventure will include  a 3 temple for exploration adventure featuring all of the 'three sisters'.
Can we see some of the 3D Folio Maps? Absolutely, and this one could possibly have 3 such maps, as well as the standard 'blue' maps common to early modules.

What are all the other Folio products? The Folio adventure series has typically been in physical form and can be found at artofthegenre.com.  Thus far, there  have been  21 Folio standard removable cover adventures, and 5 hardcover Folio books  (3 compile and reprint the Folio campaigns, and 2 are gaming supplements).  You can see more about these products in the video  below.  Here is a video of me showing some of them.  It's and older video, sir, but it checks out.

What are the 'Orange Spine' books?: These 'Complete' volumes include not only all the information from 6 Folio adventure modules, but also 6 or more 'mini-adventure' supplements  added for extra content, iconic character cards that are playable, and a  gazetteer supplement that defines the world the adventure takes place  in.  Also included is the Storyteller's Arcana, a 128 page DM & Player guide of my own tips and experiences in 30 years of gaming, and the Folio of Fiendish Monsters with 115 new monsters.  ALL these books are in in both AD&D and 5th Edition D&D formats.
*TRADEMARK DISCLAIMER
D&D"" and ""AD&D"" are trademarks of Wizards of the Coast, LLC. Art of the Genre is not affiliated with Wizards of the Coast LLC. We make no claim to, or challenge to, such trademarks.

150 Backers: Inclusion of a topographical map of The Barrens, in which this setting takes place!",6.0,1,"10 Campaigns

Want to see the game for yourself, Go to our website to download our free early access PDF: Westkoreaquest.com
Short Summary

West Korea quest is a new tabletop RPG system inspired by some of the greatest games of the day. It seam-fully blends magic, technology, modernism, post-modernism, and fun into one ""great"" game. God, I hate myself (The previous line was included to appeal to our target demographic). It is both a parody of and an ode to modern art and culture. This magnum opus is the ""brain"" ""child"" of authors Alex Wears and James Hopkins.
West Korea takes place in the wondrous world of West Korea. A bizarre and ancient world of many races ripped apart by the modern and magical. The world is rich and ready for adventuring

West Korea has 11 playable species, 8 unique classes, 26 unique sub classes, 24 gods, and 59049 unique alignment combinations. The game is rules medium and designed to be able to be played as tactics or story focused.

A unique factor of West Korea Quest is it's commitment to home-brewing. It was specifically encouraged in the rules that DM's work with their players to add their own rules and additions. As it say's in our motto: ""No list is complete and the rules don't matter""
<h3>What We Need &amp
We are looking for 2000 dollars to put book into printing. By donating you can get access to a first addition copy along with:
<ul>
• Your name printed as a donor in the back of our book.
• A signed WKQ poster.
• Thank you letter
• WKQ stickers
• God's of West Korea Calendar
• A personalized insertion into the game in the form of a companion, historical figure, or spell inventor.
Other Ways You Can Help
Share our game and website so more people can see it. Our primary goal is to get people playing our game.

Colony Clash: Insect Warfare is a card game where players fight using their chosen insect race to defeat the other players. Players build food production resources and their insect army over the course of the game to achieve victory!
Colony Clash can be played by 2 to 4 players. Each player controls one of four species
